content:
OUT! RUN OUT! All over for Zimbabwe! Pushed through from around the wicket by Taijul Islam, this keeps a bit low, on middle, Vincent Masekesa gets back and stabs it out to the right of mid-wicket. He gets called through for a quick single by Blessing Muzarabani. Mominul Haque gets to the ball quickly at mid-wicket and fires in a throw at the bowling end. He scores a direct hit and the third umpire is called into action. The replays show that Vincent had his bat on the line and no part of it was behind the crease when the stumps lit up. Bangladesh register a win by an innings and 106 runs!
Vincent Masekesa run out (Mominul Haque) 2 (15b 0x4 0x6)
Tosses it up, full and on off, Vincent Masekesa guides it to backward point.
SIX! Clean strike! Loopy delivery, right in the slot, on off, Blessing Muzarabani winds up and clobbers it over deep mid-wicket for a biggie.
Full and around off, Blessing Muzarabani blocks it out well.
Pushed through, full and at the stumps, Blessing Muzarabani dabs it down.
Full and at the stumps, Blessing Muzarabani gets behind the line to keep it out.
More air on this one, on a length, Blessing Muzarabani gets on the front foot to keep it out.
Floated up, full and on off, Blessing Muzarabani defends it off the front foot.
Again beaten! Slower through the air, turning away, Vincent Masekesa looks to play it into the leg side as he closes the bat face and the ball goes past his outside edge.
Flatter quicker and outside off, Vincent Masekesa pokes at it as he gets beaten on the outside edge.
Full on middle, Blessing Muzarabani flicks it to the right of short square leg for a single.
Tossed up, outside off, Blessing Muzarabani leaves it alone.
Shorter on middle, Blessing Muzarabani blocks it solidly off the front foot.
Full on off, Blessing Muzarabani pushes it to mid off.

Full and sliding down leg, Blessing Muzarabani looks to flick it and can't get any bat on it. The ball went very close to the bat. The leg slip fielder misfields and the ball runs away behind the wicket. Batters runs three byes.

Again tossed up, given a lot of air, Blessing Muzarabani looks to flick it as the ball hits his front pad and lobs up in the air. The forward short leg fieder takes the catch. But there's clearly no bat.
Full on middle, Blessing Muzarabani blocks it back to the bowler.
Tossed up on middle, shorter and turning into the right hander, Vincent Masekesa manages to flick it behind square for a single.
Short and on off, Vincent Masekesa dabs it off the back foot to point.
Full and on middle, Vincent Masekesa gets on the front foot to block.
Sharp turn and bounce! This is zipped through, short and around off, Blessing Muzarabani hangs his bat out in front to defend but gets beaten on the outside edge.
Turning away, fuller and on off, Blessing Muzarabani eases it to point.

Full and just outside off, almost yorked Blessing Muzarabani, who looks to push it off the crease. A loud appeal for caught behind as the ball went past the outside edge. There's some discussion going around and they go for the review. Here's the UltraEdge coming up on screen. Nothing as the ball goes past the outside edge and the on field call stays.

OUT! CAUGHT! This is tossed up on off, given a lot of air by Taijul Islam. Seeing that, Richard Ngarava decides to go aerial and slogs this one straight up in the air towards deep mid-wicket, where Hasan Mahmud takes an easy catch.
Richard Ngarava c H Mahmud b T Islam 5 (20b 1x4 0x6)
Short and turning into the left hander, Richard Ngarava looks to defend it as the ball hits the front pad and lobs up in the air. The leg slip fielder takes it, but there's clearly no bat.
Short and turning down leg, Richard Ngarava leaves it alone.
Tosses it up, full and on middle, Vincent Masekesa blocks it out.

DROPPED! Shadman Islam shells it! Loopy delivery, fuller and on off, Richard Ngarava has s swipe across the line and gets an outside edge. It travels quickly to second slip at chest height but Shadman fails to hold on. The ball rolls behind for one.
Short and on off, Richard Ngarava pushes it to cover.
Slows it down, fuller as well, on Richard Ngarava defends.
On off, on a nagging length, Vincent Masekesa pushes it wide of cover for a single.
Short on middle, Vincent Masekesa punches it back to the bowler.
Short and outside off, Richard Ngarava fends it off his pads as that was way outside off.
Full on off, Richard Ngarava looks to defend it as the ball hits the inside half of the bat and then brushes the pads and goes into the ground.
Short and turning into the left hander, Richard Ngarava looks to work it off the back foot and gets beaten by the turn as the ball hits his back leg near thigh pad area.
Full on off, Richard Ngarava gets a stride forward and blocks it into the ground.
Quicker and fuller, outside off, Richard Ngarava looks to push it off the front foot and gets beaten on the outside edge as that one didn't turn.
Tossed up just outside off, Richard Ngarava goes for the loft and misses it as the ball turns in and beats his inside on the way to the keeper.
Looped up, full and on off, Vincent Masekesa gets forward to keep it out.
Beaten! Pushed through, this does not turn, Vincent Masekesa defends inside the line and gets beaten on the outside edge.
Short and on off, Vincent Masekesa pats it down on the off side.
On off, on a length, Vincent Masekesa gets on the front foot to block.
Tosses it up, full and around off, Vincent Masekesa lunges to defend.

OUT! CAUGHT! Ben Curran departs and the end is near for Zimbabwe! A fifer and 100 on the same day in Test Cricket. A dream day for Miraz. Tossed up delivery that drifts in a bit on off, before turning away. Ben Curran is lured into the forward defence as he leans forward and looks to defend it. The ball takes the outside edge and goes into the hands of the wicket-keeper Jaker Ali. Mehidy Hasan Miraz has his 5th.
Ben Curran c J Ali b MH Miraz 46 (103b 5x4 0x6)
Full on off, Richard Ngarava drives this to mid off.
FOUR! Take that! Richard Ngarava takes the aerial route! Tossed up on off, Richard Ngarava goes downtown as he deposits this one on the bounce to the long off boundary,
Full and outside off, Richard Ngarava pushes it to short cover.
Tossed up on middle, almost yorked Richard Ngarava who manages to defend it somehow. Appeal for LBW, but the ball has clearly hit the bat. So Bangladesh don't go for the review.
Full and outside off, Richard Ngarava lets it go.
Full on middle, Ben Curran flicks it off his front pad into the leg side to the right of square leg for a single.
On a nagging length, on off, Richard Ngarava hangs back to defend.
Full and on off, Richard Ngarava blocks it out.
Sliding onto the pads, on a length, Richard Ngarava lunges to flick it away but misses and wears it on the front pad.

OUT! Caught! Wellington Masakadza perishes in pursuit of playing his shots! Tossed up delivery from Mehidy Hasan Miraz, on middle, Wellington Masakadza looks to play the lofted shot over long on, and gets a leading edge that goes into the hands of Taijul Islam at mid off who doesn't make any mistake.
Wellington Masakadza c T Islam b MH Miraz 10 (26b 0x4 1x6)

Tossed up on off, Ben Curran decides to take the aerial route to park this over long on, and skips down the track. He only manages to get height on it as the ball falls just ahead of the mid on fielder who was running back. Single taken.
A touch full on off, Ben Curran leans forward and defends it.
Overpitched outside off, Wellington Masakadza drives this off the front foot to long off for a single.

A touch fuller, on off, Wellington Masakadza looks to defend it off the front foot and gets an outside edge as the ball sneaks through between the first and second slip fielder and runs down towards third man region. Batters run two for it as the short third man cuts it off. Wellington Masakadza played it with soft hands and hence the edge didn't carry to slips.
Short again, just outside off, Wellington Masakadza pushes it off the back foot to point.
Short and outside off, Wellington Masakadza punches it to short cover.
Slower and shorter turning away, Wellington Masakadza leaves it alone.
SIX! Pulled away! Wellington Masakadza is not hanging around! Short on middle, Wellington Masakadza rocks back and pulls this one over cow corner region for six.
Fuller and on off, Ben Curran defends it off the front foot.
Turning away, on a nagging length, Wellington Masakadza lunges to defend. Gets an outside edge that beats the diving second slip fielder.
Short and on off, Wellington Masakadza pushes it to cover.
On off, on the shorter side, defended.
Full and on off, Wellington Masakadza defends it off the front foot.
Floated up, around off, Wellington Masakadza has a swipe across the line but misses.
Floated up, turning away, left alone by Ben Curran.
FOUR! Nicely done! Fractionally short, on middle, Ben Curran goes on the back foot and pulls it over mid-wicket for a boundary.
Full and on off, blocked out.
Short on middle, Ben Curran blocks it into the off side.
Short, on off, Ben Curran looks to play it off the back foot and gets beaten as the ball hits his pads and goes behind the stumps. Height is the problem. So Bangladesh won't go for the review.

Now what has happened here? Tossed up delivery, a touch fuller on off, Ben Curran looks to defend it off the crease as the ball hits the bottom of the bat and goes into the ground and back to the keeper. Bangladesh appeal for the catch. They reckon the ball has hit Ben Curran's boot and then lobbed up as the keeper gobbled it up. The umpire at bowlers' end signals for the third umpire to confirm it. Here’s the slow motion coming up. Oh, the ball has hit the ground clearly. So it is not out.

Short and angled into the left hander from wide of the crease, Wellington Masakadza looks to work it off the back foot and gets rapped on the pads. A loud appeal from the bowling side but the umpire is unmoved. Bangladesh decide to go for the review. Here's the third umpire on screen. Nothing on UltraEdge. Here's the ball tracking coming up. Pitching in line, Impact in line, wickets hitting on umpire's call. On field call stays. NOT OUT flashes on the big screen.
Tossed up, outside off, Wellington Masakadza blokcs it off the back foot.
Short and outside off, Wellington Masakadza punches it to point fielder.
A touch short on middle, Wellington Masakadza looks to work it off the back foot and gets a leading edge which goes on two bounces to the bowler.
Full on off, Wellington Masakadza defends it off the front foot into the ground.
Short on middle, Wellington Masakadza pushes it to mid on.
Short on leg, Wellington Masakadza tucks it to deep square fielder for a single.

Oh! How has that missed the stumps? Short and turning into the left hander, Wellington Masakadza is surprised by the sharp turn as he rocks on the back foot and looks to cut it. The ball goes past his inside edge and just about takes the off stump on it's way to the keeper. That was very very close to the off stump.
Short and just outside off, Wellington Masakadza hangs back as he blocks it off the back foot.
Short and outside off, Wellington Masakadza punches it to point.
Short and turning into the left hander, on leg, Ben Curran this time works it off the back foot to deep backward square leg for a single.

FOUR! Poor line and punished! Short and turning into the left hander, but the line is down the leg side, Ben Curran takes full advantage of it as he pulls this fine towards deep fine leg region to pick up a boundary.
Full and on off, Wellington Masakadza gets forward to smother the spin.
Beaten! Slower and fuller, the ball dips on Wellington Masakadza who is lured into the forward defence. The ball rips past his outside edge.
Drags the length back, on off, Wellington Masakadza defends it well.
Full and on middle, Wellington Masakadza lunges to block it out.

OUT! CAUGHT! Now he has to go! Zimbabwe are falling like nine pins here in Chattogram! Quicker, flatter on middle, Tafadzwa Tsiga puts a stride forward in pursuit of a forward defence, the ball turns sharply and takes the inside edge and goes to forward short leg where, Anamul Haque takes a very sharp catch. Mehidy Hasan Miraz has his third and what a day he is having!
Tafadzwa Tsiga (wk) c A Haque b MH Miraz 0 (2b 0x4 0x6)

Appeal for catch and given! Tafadzwa Tsiga is quick to review it as he feels there's no bat. This is an off break that pitches outside off and turns into the right hander on middle. Tafadzwa Tsiga looks to flick it as the ball goes past his inside edge and hits the front pad before lobbing up in the air and going in the hands of short leg. Here's the third umpire on screen. Nothing on UltraEdge and there's a big gap when the ball goes past the edge. Tafadzwa Tsiga survives!
A touch full on off, Ben Curran defends it off the front foot, back to the bowler.
FOUR! Short and cut away! Short outside off, lot of width on offer, Ben Curran cuts this one through extra covers region for four.
Short and outside off, Ben Curran punches it back to the bowler.
Short and on the pads, Ben Curran tucks it on the bounce to short leg.
Fuller and on off, Ben Curran defends it off the front foot.
Floated up, full and on off, Ben Curran block it out.

OUT! LBW! Appeal for LBW and given! That one turned sharply as it pitched outside off and came into the right hander on middle leg. Wessly Madhevere is surprised by the vicious turn on offer, as he goes on the back foot and looks to defend it but can't get his bat down in time as the ball hits his pads, right in front of the wickets. The umpire has no hesitation in raising his finger as it looks very plumb. Wessly Madhevere wants to test his luck and he refers it to the third umpire by signalling a 'T'. Here's the third umpire on screen. Nothing on UltraEdge. Ball Tracking coming up. Pitching outside off, impact in line and wickets hitting. Three reds and Wessly Madhevere has to go. Mehidy Hasan Miraz, the hero with bat, is now doing it with ball in hand!
Wessly Madhevere lbw MH Miraz 0 (5b 0x4 0x6)
Overpitched on off, Wessly Madhevere defends it off the front foot into the ground.
Short and turning into the right hander, Wessly Madhevere goes for the flick as the ball bounces a bit extra and hits his thigh pad.
Full on off, Wessly Madhevere drives it to short cover.
Played towards mid off by Wessly Madhevere.

OUT! CLEANED HIM UP! A rush of blood for Craig Ervine and he pays the ultimate price! Looped up by Mehidy, at the stumps, Ervine is enticed into the big shot as he comes charging down the track and looks to go down the ground. Gets beaten all ends up and sees the stumps shattered. Ervine falls after doing all the hard work. Zimbabwe are now 69/4, trailing by 148 runs.
Craig Ervine (c) b MH Miraz 25 (56b 2x4 0x6)
Tossed up on off, Ben Curran flicks it to short mid-wicket.
Full and on middle, Craig Ervine flicks it along the ground to deep mid-wicket for a single.

Short and quick, well outside off, Craig Ervine looks to cut it, but is late on it as the ball beats his outside edge. Oh there's a stumping appeal referred upstairs! Nothing there, Craig Ervine's foot is grounded. Not out displays on the giant screen.
Short and outside off, Ben Curran pulls it along the ground to long on for a single.
Short again, turning in a bit, on off, Ben Curran works it straight to short mid-wicket.
Short on middle, Ben Curran blocks it off the back foot.
Short and on off, Craig Ervine taps it down on the off side.
Shorter and quicker, on off, Craig Ervine chops it down on the off side.
Fuller and on off, Craig Ervine lunges to dab it down.
Short and on off, Craig Ervine goes back to defend.
Full and turning away, on off, Craig Ervine blocks it well.
Tosses it up, full and on off, driven to mid off.
Short and on middle, Ben Curran gets back to keep it out.
Fuller and slower, on off, Ben Curran dabs it down.
Fired in, full and on middle, swept away to deep square leg for one.
Loopy delivery, full and on off, Ben Curran launches it down to long on for a single.
More air on this one, full and on off, Ben Curran gets on the front foot to defend.
Tosses it up, full and on middle, Ben Curran smothers the spin.
Attacking the front pad, full in length, Craig Ervine ekes out an inside edge as he looks to defend.
Outside off, on a length, left alone by Craig Ervine.
Coming in with the arm, short and on off, Craig Ervine pats it down.
Full and on off, Craig Ervine defends it out on the off side.
Around off, on a length, Craig Ervine reaches out in front for the paddle but misses due to the turn.
On off, on a length, Craig Ervine gets forward to defend.
Pushed through, on a nagging length, at the stumps, Ben Curran stabs it down.
Fuller, on off, Ben Curran gets on the front foot to block but the ball turns back in sharply to beat the inside edge.
Short and turning in, on middle, Ben Curran waits back to block.
Short and on middle, Ben Curran pats it down.
Spinning back in sharply, on a nagging length, on middle, Ben Curran gets beaten for turn in his defence and wears it on the front pad.

In the air...but safe! Loopy delivery, turning in, on middle and leg, Craig Ervine reaches out in front to play the reverse. Gets a top edge but it falls well in front of Mushfiqur Rahim at deep third. They cross.
On off, on the shorter side, Ben Curran punches it to cover.
Shorter and quicker, around off, Ben Curran dabs it late to the left of second slip for a couple of runs.
Short and on off, Ben Curran pushes it off the back foot to point.
Short and turning away, outside off, Ben Curran lets it pass.
Fired into the pads, on a length, Ben Curran stabs it out on the leg side.
On a nagging length, on middle, Ben Curran blocks it out right under his eyes.
Fuller and on off, Craig Ervine lunges to smother the spin.
This keeps a bit low, short and on middle, Craig Ervine hangs back to defend.
Full and around off, Craig Ervine gets a good stride in to defend. Gets beaten onto the pads but the impact was outside the line.
Short and turning into the pads, Craig Ervine flicks it past leg slip for a couple of runs.
FOUR! Nicely done! Floated up, full and on off, Craig Ervine reaches out in front and plays the reverse. Plays it fine of short third for a boundary.
Short and on off, Craig Ervine goes on the back foot to defend.
Short and on off, Ben Curran keeps it out.
On off, on a good length, defended.

All run four! Short and on off, Ben Curran rocks back and punches it past cover. Hasan Mahmud puts in a slide in the deep to prevent the boundary. Releases the throw towards the bowling end where Mehidy Hasan Miraz fails to collect it cleanly and allows an overthrow as the batters run four.
Short and on middle, Ben Curran hangs back to defend.
Short and a bit of turn, on off, Ben Curran blocks it out.
Short and on off, Ben Curran stabs it down on the off side.
Full and outside off, Craig Ervine gets forward to defend but the ball spins back to catch the front pad.
Short and on off, Craig Ervine pushes it to cover.
Tosses it up, full and on middle, Craig Ervine steps out to block.
Short and on leg, Craig Ervine defends it down on the leg side.
Short and wide on off, guided past first slip for a single.
Short and on leg, Ben Curran keeps it out on the leg side.
On a nagging length, on middle, Craig Ervine pats it down the deck.

DROPPED! Najmul Hossain Shanto puts down a simple chance! On a nagging length, on off, Craig Ervine lunges to block it out. A bit of extra bounce and turn results in the ball catching the outside edge. It dips on Shanto at first slip who does not stay low enough to get his hands under the ball. The ball grazes his fingertips and drops down.
Floated up, full and on off, Craig Ervine blocks it well.
Too full, on the pads, Craig Ervine brings his wrists into play and clips it to the left of mid on for a couple of runs.
Fuller and on middle, Craig Ervine gets forward to smother the spin.
Short and on off, Ben Curran punches it past cover for a single.

Good effort in the field! Short and turning into the pads, Ben Curran goes back and flicks it off the pads towards deep backward square leg where Hasan Mahmud runs to his left and puts in a dive. Flicks the ball away from the fence in time and saves a run for his side.
Pushed through, flatter and at the stumps, Craig Ervine goes deep in the crease and nudges it past short leg for a single.
On off, on a nagging length, Craig Ervine solidly blocks it out.
Shorter and quicker, on middle, Craig Ervine rocks back and defends.
Loopy delivery, full and on off, Ben Curran goes for the drive but gets it off the inner half to long for a single.
Short and on middle, Ben Curran tucks it on the bounce to short leg.
Full and around off, Craig Ervine stabs it down on the off side.
Fuller and on off, Craig Ervine commits on the front foot to block but gets it off the outer half of the bat past short third for a couple of runs.
Short and on off, Ben Curran gets on top of it and punches it wide of cover for a single.
On off, on a length, Ben Curran blocks it well.
Attacking the front pad, on a nagging length, Ben Curran defends it out off the front foot.
Bowls it short, on off, Ben Curran works it across on the leg side through mid-wicket for a couple of runs more.
Short and on off, Craig Ervine pats it down on the off side.
Short and on middle, Craig Ervine rocks back and jabs it to the left of mid on for a couple of runs.
Slows it down and keeps it full, on off, Ben Curran eases it to long off for one.
Full and around off, Craig Ervine knocks it wide of mid off for a single.
Ouch, that will hurt! Keeps it full, on off, Craig Ervine drives it firmly to silly point where the ball catches Mominul Haque on the wrist.
Massive turn! Drifting in from around the wicket, on a nagging length, Craig Ervine looks to push it down the ground but the ball lands and spins away sharply to beat the bat.
Around the sixth stump, on a nagging length, left alone by Ben.
Flat and short, on the pads, Ben Curran tucks it to square leg.
Outside off, on a nagging length, Ben Curran shoulders arms.
Sliding on with the arm, full and on middle, Ben Curran flicks but misses and wears it on the front pad.
Short and on middle, Ben Curran pulls it to square leg.
Floated up, full and on off, Craig Ervine pushes it to long off for a single.
FOUR! Short and on middle, Ben Curran rocks on the back foot and whips it through mid-wicket for a boundary.
On off, a bit quicker, Craig Ervine defends it with soft hands and gets an outside edge that sneaks past second slip for a single.
FOUR! Up and over! Looped up, full and on off, Craig Ervine gets to the pitch of the ball nicely and pumps it over mid off for a boundary.
On the pads, on a nagging length, Craig Ervine tucks it through mid-wicket for a couple of runs.
On a nagging length, on off, Craig Ervine stays back and defends.
Tosses it up, full and on off, Craig Ervine walks out.
Short and wide on off, Ben Curran slaps it to cover.
Sliding on with the arm, short and on the pads, Ben Curran tucks it to square leg.
Floats it up, fuller and slower, on off, Ben Curran trie to play the paddle but gets an inside edge onto the pads.
Short and on off, Ben Curran pushes it to cover.
Short and on off, Ben Curran steers it towards backward point.

A loud shout for LBW but turned down! Seemed to be going down leg. Arm ball from around the wicket, on a nagging length, on middle, Ben Curran plays for the turn and gets beaten on the inside edge to wear him on the front pad.
Flat and short, on off, Craig Ervine steers it to backward point.
Short and turning away, on off, Craig Ervine pats it down on the off side.
Full and around off, Craig Ervine defends it solidly by getting forward.
Slows it down and goes full, on off, Craig Ervine blocks it well off the front foot.
Short again, on off, Craig Ervine knocks it back to the bowler.
Short and on off, pushed to cover by Craig Ervine.
Tosses it up, full and on off, Ben Curran gets to the pitch of the ball to keep it out.
On a nagging length, on off, Ben Curran pats it down the deck.
Beauty! Slower through the air, on a nagging length, on off, Ben Curran defends inside the line and gets beaten.
Tosses it up, full and on off, Ben Curran defends it well.
Pushed through, on a nagging length, Ben Curran ekes out an inside edge onto the pads.
On off, on a nagging length, Ben Curran shoulders arms.
Full and on off, defended off the front foot.
On a nagging length, on off, Craig Ervine blocks it out off the front foot.

OUT! TAKEN! It's Shadman Islam again with another fine grab! The move to bring Nayeem Hasan works for Bangladesh. Tosses it up from around the wicket, Sean Williams reaches out in front to smother the spin. Defends it with hard hands and away from his body. Gets an outside edge that goes low towards second slip where Shadman Islam takes it around his boot. Craig Ervine walks out to bat.
Sean Williams c S Islam b N Hasan 7 (17b 0x4 0x6)
On a length, on off, Sean Williams eases it to cover.
Short and on off, Ben Curran punches it to cover for a single.
Loose shot but Sean Williams gets away with it! Floated up, on the pads, Sean Williams gets down for the sweep but gets a top edge that falls in the vacant short fine leg region for a single.
Pushed through, on a nagging length, on middle, Ben Curran stays back to defend.
Turn and bounce! Short and spinning away, over off, Ben Curran hangs back and looks to clip it away on the leg side but gets beaten by the turn and bounce.
Short and on off, Ben Curran hangs back to defend.
Tosses it up, full and on off, knocked to long off for a single.
Short and on off, Sean Williams jabs it wide of mid-wicket for a couple of runs.
Floated up, full and on middle, Sean Williams blocks it out off the front foot.
On the pads again, on the shorter side, Ben Curran tucks it past short leg for a couple of runs. Zimbabwe end the session, trailing by 200 runs.
FOUR! Risky shot! Too straight from around the wicket, short and on the pads, Ben Curran plays it with the turn as he tickles it past the diving leg slip fielder for a boundary.
Short and on middle, Sean Williams punches it to long on and crosses over.
Pushed through, not that short for the pull, around leg, Sean Williams swivels but fails to connect as the ball sneaks under the blade.
Slows it down and offers flight, full and on middle, Sean Williams reaches out in front for the flick. Gets an inside edge onto the pads.
Short and turning down leg, Sean Williams lets it pass.
Gives the ball air, full and on off, firmly driven to cover where a misfield allows a single.
Sliding on with the arm, shorter and quicker, Sean Williams manages to keep it out despite the low bounce.
Outside off, this turns away a bit, on a nagging length, left alone by Sean.
Fuller and slower, on off, Sean Williams lunges to block it out.
Short and on off, Sean Williams gets back to dab it down.
This keeps low, flat and short from around the wicket, Sean Williams hangs back to defend.
Around off, not much air given, Ben Curran presses forward to keep it out.
Lands it full at the stumps, Ben Curran defends it down on the leg side.
Full and around off, Sean Williams pushes it wide of cover for a quick single.

OUT! LBW! A loud shout for LBW but the umpire turns it down after giving it a long thought! This looked dead straight in real time. This comes in with the arm, on a length, on the line of the off stump. Nick Welch does not offer any shot and just shoulders arms, expecting the ball to turn away. It does not turn and goes onto hit him on the front pad. The Ball Tracking comes up as three reds with the ball crashing into the off stump. A duck for Welch and Taijul Islam has two in the over. Sean Williams is the new batter.
Nick Welch lbw T Islam 0 (2b 0x4 0x6)
Speared in, full and on off, Nick Welch plays for the turn and defends outside the line. Gets it off the inner half to short leg.

OUT! EDGED AND GONE! A fine low catch from Shadman Islam! The in-form Brian Bennett departs. Floated up from around the wicket, on the off stump, Brian Bennett lunges to defend but does not get to the pitch of the ball to smother the spin. The ball spins away to catch the shoulder of the bat with a bit of bounce. It goes low towards second slip where Shadman Islam stays low and snaffles it around his left ankle. Zimbabwe are now 8/1, trailing by 209 runs.
Brian Bennett c S Islam b T Islam 6 (16b 1x4 0x6)
More loop on this one, full and outside off, Ben Curran tries the reverse sweep but wears it on the forearm.
Was there an edge? Full and outside off, Ben Curran goes for the reverse but misses. There is a noise as the ball goes past the bat and Jaker Ali gets low to collect but fails to hang on.
This is the arm ball, around off, Ben Curran covers the off stump and makes the leave.
Beaten! This lands and spins away, Ben Curran expects the ball to go on with the arm and hangs his bat out to defend but gets beaten due to the turn.
Full and on middle, Brian Bennett clips it in front of mid-wicket and takes a quick single.

Almost a wicket off the first ball for Mehidy Hasan Miraz! Tosses it up from around the wicket, full and around off, Ben Curran gets down on a knee and looks to go against the turn over mid on. Gets an outside edge and luckily for him, the ball evades the man at short third. They cross.
Short and on off, Brian Bennett stays back to keep it out.
Sliding on with the arm, short and on the pads, Brian Bennett misses the flick and wears it on the pads.
Very full, down leg, Brian Bennett swings to get it away but misses.
A bit of extra bounce, short and on off, Brian Bennett plays it with soft hands towards backward point.
Shorter and quicker, on off, Brian Bennett cuts it to point.
Short and on off, Brian Bennett hangs back and defends it down on the off side.
This skids through, on a short of a length, over off, Ben Curran swivels for the pull but misses as the ball goes under the blade.
In the channel on off, on a nagging length, Ben Curran shoulders arms.
From wide of the crease, slanting in on a good length, on middle, Ben Curran gets behind the line and stabs it down the deck.
On a good length, on middle, Ben Curran nudges it to square leg from the crease.
Play and a miss! On a back of a length, outside off, Ben Curran has a waft at the delivery but the ball keeps a bit low and sneaks under the bat.
Lands it full from around the wicket, on middle, Ben Curran eases the drive to mid on.
This grips and spins away sharply, short and around off, Brian Bennett pokes at the delivery belatedly but gets away with it. Gets an outside edge but it goes into the ground wide of first slip.
Turning back in sharply, on off, Ben Curran stays back and punches it to long on for a single.
On a nagging length, on off, Ben Curran watchully pats it down off the back foot.
Turning into the pads, on the fuller side, Ben Curran tickles it to short fine leg.
This does not turn as much as the previous ball, on off, on a nagging length, Ben Curran defends it off the back foot.
Short and spinning away, Brian Bennett backs away and punches it off the back foot to deep point for a single.
Sprayed down leg, on a good length, Ben Curran misses the tickle. A good diving take to his right by Jaker Ali.
Beaten! Angling in from around the wicket, on a nagging length. The ball nips away off the deck and zips past the defence of Ben Curran.
Drags the length back, on off, Ben Curran gets on top of the bounce and keeps it out.
A bit fuller, on off, Ben Curran gets his bat out in front to push it back to the bowler.
In the channel on off, on a short of a length, steered to backward point.
From around the wicket, on a back of a length, on off, Ben Curran gets behind the line of the ball and pats it down the deck.

An absolute beauty to end the over! Drifting in from around the wicket, full and on the off stump, Brian Bennett prods forward to defend. The ball straightens to go past the outside edge and sneaks past the off pole.
Short and on off, Brian Bennett rocks back for the cut but mistimes the shot to cover.
Slows it down and the length stays full, outside off, Brian Bennett smothers the spin.
Pushed through, fuller and on off, Brian Bennett blocks it out solidly.
FOUR! Brian Bennett and Zimbabwe are underway! Floated up, full and outside off, Brian Bennett gets a good stride in and firms the drive. Hits it a bit uppishly but well wide of cover for a boundary.
Tossed up from around the wicket, around off, on a length, Brian Bennett gets forward to defend.

OUT! STUMPED! Vincent Masekesa has a fifer! And finally Bangladesh's innings has come to an end. Tossed up, outside off, inviting the batter for the big one, Mehidy Hasan Miraz skips down the track to go for the big one, he misses as the ball turns away to beat his outside edge. Tafadzwa Tsiga does the rest. Bangladesh finish the first innings with a big lead of 217 runs!
Mehidy Hasan Miraz st T Tsiga b V Masekesa 104 (162b 11x4 1x6)
Floated up, full and on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz blocks it out.
Pushed through, flat and short, on off, Hasan Mahmud covers the line and pats it down on the off side.
Slower and shorter, on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz runs it down wide of short third for a single.
On off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz gets on top of the bounce and punches it to the right of the bowler.
Keeps it short, on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz plays it towards mid-wicket again.
Short and on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz turns it to mid-wicket.
Going down leg, Mehidy Hasan Miraz lets it be.
Turning away, on a nagging length, around off, Hasan Mahmud defends inside the line and gets beaten on the outside edge.
Very full, on the pads, Mehidy Hasan Miraz swipes it away to deep backward square leg and takes the single this time.
Floated up, full and on middle, swept away to deep backward square leg but Mehidy does not take the single.
Pushed through, short and on middle, nudged to mid-wicket.
Turning away, short and around off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz stabs it out on the off side.
Short and on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz pulls it to deep mid-wicket but does not take the single.
Full on middle, Hasan Mahmud blocks it off the front foot. That will be drinks. Quite an eventful last hour!
Short again, on middle, this time Mehidy Hasan Miraz manages to pull it wide of the short mid-wicket fielder for a single.
Short length, off break on leg, Mehidy Hasan Miraz rocks back and pulls this straight to short mid-wicket.
Shorter on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz works it off the back foot to short mid-wicket.
Flighted delivery on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz commits on the front foot and drives it back to the bowler.
Tossed up on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz drives it to mid off.
Turning away, on off, Hasan Mahmud defends inside the line and gets beaten.
Short and turning into the pads, Hasan Mahmud lets it be and allows the ball to hit his pads.
Keeps it full, on off, Hasan Mahmud gets to the pitch of the ball and blocks it out.
Full toss, on the pads, Hasan Mahmud drives it to mid on.
Low full toss, slower through the air, on off, knocked to long off for a single.
Turning away, short and on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz hangs back to stab it down.
Looped up, full and around off, Hasan Mahmud smothers the spin as he gets forward.
Drags the length back and slows it down, on off, Hasan Mahmud blocks it out off the front foot.
Tosses it up, full and on off, Hasan Mahmud lunges to defend.

And there it is! Finally! He gets there does Mehidy Hasan Miraz! Shorter on leg, Mehidy Hasan Miraz works it behind square towards short fine leg and takes a quick single. He jumps in joy, takes off his helmet and kisses the badge on the helmet. It's been a knock to remember. He came in with the score reading 267/5 and boy, hasn't he put Bangladesh right in front! What a player, What a hundred!
A touch short on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz cuts it, but the ball goes straight to point. He still can't get that one run.
Short on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz works it off the back foot, the ball hits the left leg of the forward short leg fielder, and Mehidy Hasan Miraz won't get the single.

Now comes the googly, Hasan Mahmud is ready for it. The ball pitches outside off, shorter in length, and turns in a bit. Hasan Mahmud watches it carefully and lets it go. Hasan Mahmud has survived the over!
Full on middle, Hasan Mahmud defends it back to the bowler.

Beaten again! Slower through the air again, turning away, Hasan Mahmud looks to plays the defense but gets beaten on the outside edge. Hasan Mahmud actually did well there as he didn't go poking at it.
Slower through the air, turning away, outside off, Hasan Mahmud is lured into the forward defence as the ball goes just past his outside edge.
Full on middle, Hasan Mahmud defends it into the ground off the front foot.

Oh, it's all happening here! Short on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz rocks back and pulls it along the ground through mid-wicket region. The long on fielder runs to his right and fires in a quick throw. Mehidy Hasan Miraz wanted the second but has to go back. The throw was good, but the bowler couldn't collect it, else it would have been very tight.
Full on off, Hasan Mahmud solidly defends it off the front foot. He survives and there is big cheer across the ground as they know that Mehidy Hasan Miraz will be on strike next over.

OUT! CAUGHT! Tanzim Hasan Sakib has played one shot too many here as he has now left his partner stranded on 98 at the non-striker's end. Tossed up, just outside off, goes for the reverse sweep as he switches over and looks to play it over short third. In that process, he goes off balance as the ball catches his gloves and lobs up in the air towards forward short leg, where Nick Welch takes an easy catch. The bowling change has worked as Wessly Madhevere strikes.
Tanzim Hasan Sakib c N Welch b W Madhevere 41 (80b 2x4 1x6)

Lovely loopy delivery, that pitches outside off, and turns into the right hander, Tanzim Hasan Sakib looks to defend it off the front foot but the ball hits his inside edge and goes onto the pads. A bit of an appeal there but Zimbabwe decide against the review.
Quicker, fuller on middle, Tanzim Hasan Sakib pushes it to mid on.
Short on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz rocks back and punches it to the right of short mid-wicket for a single.
Shorter length off break on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz pushes it to forward short leg on the bounce.
FOUR! Swept away! Looks like even Tanzim Hasan Sakib wants to get to his 50 in a hurry. Full on pads, Tanzim Hasan Sakib sits down on one knee and sweeps it behind square, along the ground for four.
Full on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib leans forward in defence, as he pushes it into the off side.
Shorter on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz comfortably works it off the back foot to the right of short mid-wicket for a single.

Tossed up above eye line, around off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib goes for the lofted hit and doesn't middle as he ends up skying it. The ball however lands in no man's land as the long off fielder runs to his right but can't get there in time. Single taken.
Short and turning away, on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz pushes it wide of cover for a single.
Short and on middle, Tanzim Hasan Sakib jabs it wide of mid-wicket for one.
Short of a length, on middle and leg, Mehidy Hasan Miraz tucks it to mid-wicket.
Back of a length, going across, Mehidy Hasan Miraz hangs back to keep it out.
On a shortish length, down leg, Mehidy Hasan Miraz walks inside the line for the pull but misses.

Back of a length, on middle, that one came slower as it held a touch in the surface, Mehidy Hasan Miraz is already across his sticks, expecting the short ball. However, seeing the slowness of that delivery, he adjusts his shot and flicks it fine to the left of deep fine leg and picks up two runs. Bangladesh now lead by 202!

Short ball on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz agains walks a touch across and looks to pull it behind square, but can't connect. The ball goes just past his gloves. Oh, got to be careful there, Mehidy Hasan Miraz!

SIX! What a shot! And with that, Mehidy Hasan Miraz is into the 90s! Short ball from round the wicket, Mehidy Hasan Miraz was ready for it as he walks a touch across and pulls this one way over deep square leg fence for six. Oh, Mehidy Hasan Miraz, what a knock he is playing for Bangladesh.
Tossed up on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib defends it off the front foot into the off side.
Full toss on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib looks to be aggressive as he drives it fiercely but he only manages to hit it towards mid off.
Tossed up , on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz drives this to the left of short cover and picks up a single.
A touch fuller on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz defends it off the front foot.
Slower and shorter, pitching on leg and turning away on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz blocks it nicely as he waits for the turn and presents the full face of the bat as he blocks it under his eyes.

FOUR! Lovely from Mehidy Hasan Miraz! Tossed up leg break, just outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz lofts this one over extra cover region to pick up for four runs. The man from deep point runs to his right but can't cut it off.
Full length on middle, a bluff delivery from Blessing Muzarabani, but Tanzim Hasan Sakib is ready for it as he flicks it to short mid-wicket.
Back of a length, outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz hops a bit and drops this into the leg side towards short square leg and takes a single.
Short ball sliding down leg, this time Mehidy Hasan Miraz leaves it alone.
Again a short ball on leg stump, Mehidy Hasan Miraz this time walks across a bit to pull this over fine leg, but again can't get any bat on it.
Short and sliding down leg, Mehidy Hasan Miraz looks to pull it but can't connect.
Short ball from round the wicket on the body, Mehidy Hasan Miraz drops his hands as hel looks to leave it. The ball kisses his shoulders and goes on the bounce to first slip.

FOUR! Flighted delivery, outside off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib prods forward and smashes it back past the bowler for four. It was in the air for a moment, but there was no chance for Vincent Masekesa to catch that.
Short and wide outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz punches it to the right of point for a single.

Given LBW but successfully overturned by Mehidy Hasan Miraz! Quicker and flatter on leg stump, Mehidy rocks back to work it into the leg side but the ball was quick enough to beat him on the pads. Appeal for LBW and given. Miraz, though, has immediately reviewed it. Third umpire on screen. UltraEdge coming up. There's a spike as the ball is close to the bat, as well as there is a big deflection that is visible as the ball hits the bat and goes onto the pads. The on-field umpire has to change the decision. A successful review by Mehidy Hasan Miraz and Vincent Masekesa has to wait for his fifer!

Tossed up, leg break, turning away, in the channel outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz is lured into the forward defence as he leans forward, the ball goes just past the outside edge. Appeal for caught behind and not given. Zimbabwe decide against the review.
Overptiched on leg, Mehidy Hasan Miraz drives this to mid on.
Short length googly, on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz reads it well and pushes it off the back foot, back to the bowler.

Geez, that's nasty! Short ball that doesn't rise much, as Tanzim Hasan Sakib looks to duck under it, but can't out of the way as the ball hits the side part of the helmet. A mandatory concussion test will follow.
Short ball on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz hops on the back foot and works it behind square towards fine leg for a single.
Length ball on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz defends it off the front foot to short cover.
Full on middle, Tanzim Hasan Sakib flicks it in the air, as the ball falls just behind the short mid-wicket fielder. Single taken.
Short ball on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz takes it on as he pulls this towards square leg region for a single.
Full on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz solidly blocks it to mid off.
Short and turning away, just outside off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib hangs back and pushes it back to the bowler.
Overpitched on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib eases the cover drive to short cover fielder.
Very full, and outside off turning away, Tanzim Hasan Sakib looks to drive it without any feet movement and gets beaten on the outside edge.
A touch short, quick on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz defends it to the left of short cover and takes a single.
Slower through the air, just outside off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib leans forward and pushes it to the left of short cover for a single.

Sharp leg break, shorter in length, that pitches on leg stump and turns around off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz waits for the turn and then pushes it against the turn into the leg side, to the left of short square leg for a single.
Short ball on body line, Tanzim Hasan Sakib leaves it alone as he ducks under it.
Length ball, on middle, Tanzim Hasan Sakib again gets right behind the line of the ball and defends it under his eyes.
From round the wicket, short ball on middle, Tanzim Hasan Sakib ducks under it.
Again a back of length delivery, on middle, Tanzim Hasan Sakib nicely covers the line as he defends it off the back foot.
Back of a length delivery, on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib blocks it off the back foot under his eyes.
Short ball aimed at the body, Tanzim Hasan Sakib ducks under it and lets it go.
Lands it on a hard length, Mehidy Hasan Miraz walks across and pats it down the deck.
On a hard length, on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz hops and blocks it out.
On a back of a length, outside off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib slaps it to deep point for a single.
Drags the length back, on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib waits back to defend.
On a length, angling away, Mehidy Hasan Miraz checks his drive towards cover where Sean Williams misfields and concedes a single.
Going across the right-hander, full in length, Mehidy Hasan Miraz knocks it past cover for a couple of runs.
400 up for Bangladesh and the lead is now 173! Fuller and slower, on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz strides ahead to defend. Gets an inside edge and the ball dribbles past short leg for one.
Pushed through, on a nagging length, kept out off the back foot.
Flatter and shorter, on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz gets back and stabs it out.
Full, on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz lunges to defend.
Full again, on middle and leg, clipped to mid-wicket.
Tossed up, full and on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz blocks it out.
Dug in short, across the batter, Tanzim Hasan Sakib ducks and lets it pass.
Pitched up, on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib drives it to mid off.
On off, on a length, Mehidy Hasan Miraz waits back and steers it wide of backward point for a single.
FOUR! Clever, very clever! On a shortish length, over off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz hops and ramps it over the man at gully for a boundary. The lead is now 171.
Going across, on a length, Tanzim Hasan Sakib guides it past backward point for a single.
On a hard length, outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz runs it down to deep third and crosses over.
Short and on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib stabs it down on the off side.
A bit quicker and shorter, on middle, pushed to the right of the bowler.
Short and on leg, Tanzim Hasan Sakib keeps it out.
Short and turning back in sharply, this keeps a bit low, Tanzim Hasan Sakib nudges it to short mid-wicket.
Turning down leg, on the shorter side, Tanzim Hasan Sakib pads it away.
Short and on middle, Tanzim Hasan Sakib pats it back to the bowler.
On off, on a good length, Tanzim Hasan Sakib gets forward to defend. Ekes out an inside edge that rolls in front of square leg for one. The 50-run stand comes up between these two batters.
Banged in short, over middle, Tanzim Hasan Sakib ducks under it.
Fuller in length, outside off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib leans into the drive and eases it to the right of deep point for a brace. Bangladesh's lead is now 164!
Pitched up, wide on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz reaches out and knocks it to deep point for one.
On a back of a length, steered down to deep third for a single by Tanzim Hasan Sakib.
From around the wicket, on a good length, on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib blocks it out.
Slower and around the pads, kept out on the leg side by Mehidy Hasan Miraz.
Short and on the pads, Mehidy Hasan Miraz nudges but can't get it past short leg.
Full and attacking the stumps, Tanzim Hasan Sakib gets inside the line and sweeps it to deep fine leg for a single.
Fired onto the pads, on a length, Tanzim Hasan Sakib pads it away.
Short and around leg, Tanzim Hasan Sakib tucks it down to mid-wicket.
Short and on middle, Tanzim Hasan Sakib pushes it back to the bowler.
Full and on the pads, swept away to deep backward square leg for one.
Short and around off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib cuts it straight to cover-point.
Short and on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib punches it to cover.
Angling into the pads, on the fuller side, Tanzim Hasan Sakib clips it past mid-wicket and takes a coupe of runs.
Sliding on with the arm, full and on middle, Tanzim Hasan Sakib blocks it out.
Full and on off, patted down on the off side.

Excellent effort! Short and around off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz plays it late and to the left of backward point. Brian Bennett goes after it and puts in a dive to prevent the boundary. Manages to flick the ball away from the fence and saves two runs.
Short and on the pads, clipped to mid-wicket.
Missed out! A half-tracker, down leg, Mehidy Hasan Miraz pulls it straight to the man at short fine leg.
Fuller and slower, on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz pushes it to mid off.
Slows it down, fuller and on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz blocks it out.
Short and on middle, Tanzim Hasan Sakib jabs it to the right of mid on for a single.

Mehidy Hasan Miraz charges down the track early. Wellington Masakadza spots it and drags the length back. Mehidy adjusts by opening the bat face and steering it to the left of backward point for a couple.
Short and on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz dabs it down on the off side.
Slower and fuller, around off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib presses forward to go over mid off. Gets it off the outer half of the bat wide of point for one.
Fuller and on off, defended solidly by Tanzim Hasan Sakib.
On off, shorter and quicker, Tanzim Hasan Sakib hops and stabs it down.
Short and on off, guided to backward point.
Tossed up, full and on off, defended on the off side.
Bangladesh's lead is now 150! Low full toss, on the pads, knocked in front of mid on for a single.
Short and on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib steers it to backward point.
Slower and on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib drives it past cover for a couple of runs more.
SIX! Belted! Vincent Masekesa offers flight, full and on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib gets down on a knee and nails the slog sweep over mid-wicket for a biggie.
Short and on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib goes back to block.
Short and on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz punches it to cover.
Full and on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz pats it to cover.
Fuller and around off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib steers it wide of backward point for a single.
A bit of air on this one, fuller and on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib gets forward to defend.
Sliding on with the arm, on the pads, Tanzim Hasan Sakib turns it in the vacant deep backward square leg region for a brace.
Speared in, on a nagging length, on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib gets behind the line and defends.
Flat and short, on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz punches it to point.

FOUR! Skillfully done! This keeps a bit low, on the shorter side, Mehidy Hasan Miraz waits for the ball to arrive and cuts it late to the left of backward point for four more. Bangladesh's lead grows to 138.
Shorter now, on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz dabs it to backward point.
FOUR! Smashed! Looped up, a bit too full and wide on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz winds up and drills it to the right of deep point for a boundary.
A bit fuller, around off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz keeps it out.
Short and turning away, on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz hangs back to block.
On off, on a nagging length, Tanzim Hasan Sakib pats it down on the off side.
Slows it down but keeps it full, on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib gets forward to block.
Fired in, flat and short, on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib defends it solidly.
Floated up, full and around off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz reaches out and eases it to deep cover for one.
Very full, on middle, punched back again to the bowler.
Full and on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz pushes it back to the bowler.
Slower, shorter, leg break, turning away a bit, in the channel outside off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib judges it well and shoulders his arms to that one.
Full on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz skips down the track as he takes a step towards the ball and drives this along the ground to long on for a single.
Overpitched, just outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz pushes at it off the front foot.
Slower and shorter, turning away, on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz pushes it off the back foot to short mid-wicket.

Dropped! Tossed up leg break, just outside off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib goes for the lofted inside out drive, Wellington Masakadza at short cover puts his hands up but only manages to get a hand to as the ball deflects off his hand and goes wide of mid off. The batters take a single.
A touch quicker and flatter, shorter, turning away, as it pitches on leg and turns on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz comfortably rocks back and punches it to the left of mid off for a single.
Speared in short and on middle, Tanzim Hasan Sakib stabs it down.
Fuller and slower, on middle, Tanzim Hasan Sakib defends it off the front foot.
Tosses it up, full and on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib gets foward and threads it between cover and mid off for a couple of runs.
Shorter and flatter, around off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib cuts but picks out backward point.
Short and on off, Tanzim Hasan Sakib pushes it back to the bowler.
FIFTY FOR MEHIDY! 10th Test half-century for Miraz and what a time to get it. Floated up, fuller and on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz drives it in front of mid off for a quick single.
Tanzim Hasan Sakib plays it towards short mid-wicket.
Tanzim Hasan Sakib pushes it towards mid off.
Mehidy Hasan Miraz pushes it to the right of point and takes a single.
Mehidy Hasan Miraz plays it towards mid off.
Mehidy Hasan Miraz plays it towards short mid-wicket.
Four! Mehidy Hasan Miraz plays this one through point region for four.
Tanzim Hasan Sakib plays it towards mid off.
Tanzim Hasan Sakib goes back and just glances it through fine leg for couple of runs.
Play and a miss! Tanzim Hasan Sakib isn't quite sure how to play that one.
Short ball at the body, Tanzim Hasan Sakib ducks under it and lets it go.
Short on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz pulls it away through the square leg region for a single.
Mehidy Hasan Miraz plays it towards mid on.
Pushed through, short and around leg, Tanzim Hasan Sakib blocks it out off the back foot.

OUT! STUMPED! Finally the breakthrough has come for Zimbabwe! Slower through the air, tossed up, outside off, Taijul Islam skips down the track to go through the off side and misses as the ball goes past his outside edge. The wicket-keeper, Tafadzwa Tsiga does the rest and the partnership is broken. It's that man again Vincent Masekesa, the debutant. Bangladesh are now 342/8, leading by 115 runs.
Taijul Islam st T Tsiga b V Masekesa 20 (45b 3x4 0x6)
Short and outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz punches it to the left of short cover for a single.
Slower through the air, fuller, outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz prods forward and blocks it.
Tossed up, around off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz drives it to short cover.
FOUR! This will be frustrating for the visitors! This pair is really adding some valuable runs here. Full on pads, Mehidy Hasan Miraz sweeps it behind square towards deep fine leg for four.
Short ball on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz takes him on and plays the pull. The ball hits the upper part of the bat and goes along the ground to deep square leg. Single taken.
Length ball outside off, Taijul Islam cuts it in front of square to the left of deep point for a single.
FOUR! Nicely done by Taijul Islam! Short and angled into the left hander, just outside off, Taijul Islam hops on the back foot and plays the steer through third man region for four.
Again short, but this time line is just outside off, Taijul Islam blocks it off the back foot.

Short ball again aimed at the body, Taijul Islam has no answer to it as the ball climbs onto him and he somehow looks to duck under it but the ball hits his gloves and lobs up in the air, towards short leg region, no fielder there, and Taijul Islam survives.
Short ball aimed at the body, Taijul Islam looks to take it on as he goes for the pull and misses it.
On the pads, turned away through square leg for a single.
That is defended solidly off the front foot.
Short and on middle, Taijul Islam stabs it down on the leg side.
A touch fuller outside off, Taijul Islam prods forward and defends it.
Taijul Islam has just watchfully blocked this out.

FOUR BYES! Taijul Islam is beaten all ends up! Slower through the air, turning into the left hander from outside off, Taijul Islam prods forward in defence, as the ball sneaks through his bat pad and evades the keeper too, and goes for four byes. Oh, there was an inside edge on it, umpire didn't spot it and hence gave it as byes. A missed chance by the keeper then!
That is cut away but straight to the fielder at point.
Mehidy Hasan Miraz looks to play that but is comprehensively beaten.
A gentle push by Mehidy Hasan Miraz but cannot pierce the gap.
Four! No power. Just pure placement. Mehidy Hasan Miraz has just pushed this away and found the gap and the boundary.
Four! The short ball is dispatched. Square cut played and the ball races towards the boundary line.
The pull shot comes into play. One run taken.
Mehidy Hasan Miraz has cut this away but straight to the fielder at point.
Mehidy Hasan Miraz has just watchfully blocked this out.
Four! Mehidy Hasan Miraz drives this through the covers and the ball races away to the fence.
Pushed away for a single by Taijul Islam.
That is defended solidly off the front foot by Taijul Islam.
That is pushed away for a single by Mehidy Hasan Miraz.
Taijul Islam has just blocked that from the crease.
Sharp bouncer! Taijul Islam ducks.
Swing and a miss! Taijul Islam swings hard at that one but does not connect.
Played towards covers by Mehidy Hasan Miraz.
Full on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz flicks it straight to short mid-wicket.
Length ball on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz blocks it under his eyes to point.
Full on middle, Taijul Islam defends it off the front foot to forward short leg.
Full on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz drives it straight to short cover.
Looped up, full and on middle, Taijul Islam swipes it through mid-wicket for a single.

A loud shout for LBW but turned down! Tosses it up, full and turning in on middle, Taijul Islam lunges to defend but the ball spins past the inside edge to catch him on the front pad. The Ball Tracking shows that the lunge Taijul took meant that the ball went past the leg stump.
Full and outside off, Taijul Islam prods forward and blocks it.
Short and on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz cuts it late and wide of backward point for a single.
Taijul Islam has just blocked that from the crease.
Taijul Islam looks to play that but is comprehensively beaten.
One shot too many for Taijul Islam! Length ball angled in, outside off, Taijul Islam looks to cut it and gets beaten on the inside edge.
Good length, just outside off, Taijul prods forward and defends it intto the off side.
FOUR! Taijul Islam has played a lovely cut shot for four! He can bat! Pitched on a length, and wide outside off, Taijul Islam cuts it late behind point for four. He has found the gap nicely there.
Length ball angled into the right hander on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz flicks it along the ground to deep square leg for a single.
Short and around off, Taijul Islam pushes it off the back foot, back to the bowler.
Tossed up on off, Taijul Islam puts a stride forward and defends it back to the bowler.
Shorter on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz punches it to the left of short cover for a single.
Slower through the air, shorter, just outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz charges down and at the last moment plays the steer wide of first slip and picks up two runs.

Short length leg break, just outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz hangs back and looks to cut it but gets it off the gloves. A healthy deflection and the keeper, Tafadzwa Tsiga, has shelled the catch. A toughie that! But nonetheless, a missed chance!
No ball! Vincent Masekesa has overstepped! Fullish leg break on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz stretches forward and defends it to short cover.
Loosener to start from Vincent Masekesa. Full toss sliding down leg, Mehidy Hasan Miraz looks to sweep it but can't connect.
Back of a length, outside off, Taijul Islam hangs back and punches it to point. End of the over.
Overpitched from Blessing Muzarabani, on off, Taijul Islam pushes it in the gap between short cover and mid off, and calls for two straightaway. He gets two runs!
Length ball angled into the left hander, Taijul Islam sensibly defends it to point.
Length ball seaming into the left hander, well outside off, Taijul Islam slashes at it, and gets beaten on the inside edge.
From round the wicket, Full, and a hint of swing into the left hander, on middle, Taijul Islam proactively pushes it back to the bowler.
Full delivery to start, on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz flicks it along the ground in the gap between short mid-wicket and mid on. First runs of the day!
Overpitched on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz drives it to the left of short cover, and sets off for a quick single. And that will be STUMPS on Day 2.
Slower through the air, turning away, Mehidy Hasan Miraz leans forward and defends it back to the bowler.
Over pitched on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz drives it back to the bowler.
FOUR! Cut away! Mehidy Hasan Miraz is not shying away from playing his shots. Short on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz rocks back and cuts it behind square for four.
Short and quick on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz punches it past the bowler. The mid off fielder cuts it off running to his right. Batters don't take the single.
Full length leg break on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz does well to defend it off the front foot.
Full on off, Taijul Islam pushes it to mid off.
Length ball angled into the left hander, almost squared up Taijul Islam who somehow manages to play it with an open bat face.
FOUR! Taijul Islam has played one of the shots of the day! Full on off Taijul Islam leans into the drive as he plays it through covers for four.
Short ball aimed at the body, Taijul Islam does well to duck under it.
Length ball on off, Taijul Islam does well to block it towards point.
Short ball on the body, Taijul Islam does well to get out of the way.
Short delivery, on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz works it off the backfoot to the right of deep mid-wicket for two runs.
Tossed up, just outside off, Taijul Islam plays the dab behind the wickets, to the right of short third man for a single.
Fuller on off, Taijul Islam prods forward and blocks it.
A touch fuller and quicker, leg break turning into the left hander, Taijul Islam looks to flick it and gets pinged on the front pad. Appeal for LBW. Not given, perhaps sliding down leg.
Full and outside off, Taijul Islam gets a nice stride forward and defends it.
A touch short, leg break, outside off, Taijul Islam looks to defend it off the front foot and gets beaten on the outside edge.
On a length, just outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz blocks it back to the bowler.
Back of a length, outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz goes for the pull as the ball sneaks through the under edge of his bat, on the way to the keeper.
Good length on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz this time defends it confidently off the front foot back to the bowler.
Fast, full and sliding down leg. Mehidy Hasan Miraz looks to flick it but can't connect.

My goodness, that is a rocket delivery from Blessing Muzarabani! Length ball angled into the right hander, straightens after pitching as Mehidy Hasan Miraz plays the line of the ball and gets beaten on the outside edge.
Back of a length on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz hangs back and blocks it under his eyes as he covers the line of the ball.

OUT! CAUGHT! Vincent Masekesa, the leg spinner, is on a roll here! He is single-handedly bringing back Zimbabwe into the game. Tossed up leg break, around off, Nayeem Hasan is drawn into the front foot defence as the ball pitches on off and turns away and takes the outside edge, which goes straight into the hands of Sean Williams at 2nd slip. Zimbabwe are jubilant. Bangladesh are now 279/7, leading by 52 runs.
Nayeem Hasan c S Williams b V Masekesa 3 (23b 0x4 0x6)
Quick and short, on middle, Nayeem Hasan defends it off the back foot to mid on.
Full on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz drives it to mid off and sets off for a quick single.
Full and turning away, just outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz defends it into the off side.
Full toss on off, Nayeem Hasan plays a cross batted shot towards deep mid-wicket for a single.
Slower through the air, shorter, and turning away around off, Nayeem Hasan hangs back and looks to defend it off the back foot. The ball takes the outside edge and goes on the bounce to second slip.
Flighted delivery just outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz blocks it into the off side.
Floated on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz defends it off the front foot.
Slower through the air, shorter, and wide outside off, Nayeem Hasan pushes it to the left of point for a single.
A touch full outside off, Nayeem Hasan plays the sweep to short square leg, doesn't middle it.
Turn and bounce! Short and turning away, just outside off, Nayeem Hasan hangs back as he pushes it to point.
Full on off, Nayeem Hasan defends it back to the bowler.
Eased towards covers by Mehidy Hasan Miraz.
Played towards covers by Mehidy Hasan Miraz.
Played towards mid on for a single by Nayeem Hasan.
Nayeem Hasan has just watchfully blocked this out.
This is driven towards point.
Nayeem Hasan comes forward and plays the off drive but it is a dot ball.
Fuller in length, on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz gets on the front foot to defend.
Shorter and quicker, on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz cuts it late to backward point.
On a nagging length, around off, knocked to cover.
Fuller again, on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz pats it down on the off side.
Floated up, full and on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz lunges to defend.
Short and on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz hangs back to defend.

A touch full, googly pitching on off, and turning into middle, Nayeem Hasan is beaten as he didn't pick it up and looked to flick it. The ball hits the front pad and lobs up in the air. Vincent Masekesa runs forward and takes the catch. Appeal follows. Not given. And this time Zimbabwe go for the review. Third umpire on screen. Nothing on UltraEdge. Onto the Ball Tracking. Pitching in, impact in line and wickets missing. Zimbabwe lose the review. The on-field call stays! NOT OUT!

Appeal for caught behind! Not given! Short length googly, turning into the right hander, going down leg, Nayeem Hasan sits on one knee and looks to pull it and misses. The keeper collects it on the third attempt as the ball ricocheted off the batter's body. Appeal follows but the umpire is unmoved and they are not going for the review.
Full on leg, Nayeem Hasan drives it to mid on.
Now a bit quicker, fuller, on middle, Nayeem Hasan blocks it back to the bowler.
Slower through the air, shorter, turning away on off, Nayeem Hasan defends it with the turn into the off side.
Short on leg, Mehidy Hasan Miraz works it off the back foot to the left of square leg for a single.
Short again, around off, Nayeem Hasan hangs back and pushes it to short cover.
A touch shorter on off, Nayeem Hasan defends it under his eyes.
A touch full on off, Nayeem Hasan puts a big stride forward and blocks it.
Short on leg, Nayeem Hasan flicks it straigh to short square leg.
Short and on off, Nayeem Hasan dabs it to point.
Short and outside off, left alone by Nayeem.

OUT! RUN OUT! A moment of brilliance from Wessly Madhevere as he fires in a direct hit and catches Mushfiqur Rahim short of the crease at the non-striker's end. Full toss on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim drives it to mid on and calls for a quick run. Wessly Madhevere at mid on charges at the ball and fires in an underarm direct hit at the non-striker’s end. It is referred upstairs. This looks close. Here’s the slow-motion video on screen. Oh, this is out! Mushfiqur Rahim is well short and he has to go. Bangladesh are now 274/6, leading by 47 runs.
Mushfiqur Rahim run out (Wessly Madhevere) 40 (59b 4x4 1x6)
Full on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim stands tall as he drives this straight to short cover.
Tossed up again, turning away a bit, Mushfiqur Rahim hangs back and punches it to point.
Tossed up, given a lot of air, just outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim leans forward and drives it to short extra cover.
Full toss on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz flicks it to square leg and takes a single.
Tossed up on leg, Mehidy Hasan Miraz pushes it back to the bowler.
Full on off, Mushfiqur Rahim drives this one off the bottom of his bat to short cover.
Overpitched on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz commits on the front foot and drives this one along the ground to long off for a single.
Full on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz pushes it off the front foot to mid on.
FOUR! Nicely done! Short and just outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz waits for the ball to arrive and then opens his bat face at the last moment to guide it past the first slip fielder for four.
Again flighted delivery, just outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz gets a nice stride forward as he drives it to short extra cover.
Floated up on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz drives it off the front foot to short cover.

Short length, googly, that pitches outside off and turns into the right hander, that one stayed low as well. Mehidy Hasan Miraz rocks and punches it to deep extra cover for a single. The thinking was right from Vincent Masekesa but the execution wasn't that good.
Full toss on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz plays the push drive to mid off.
Overpitched on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz drives it straight to mid off.
Quicker and flatter, turning away on off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz manages to play it with the turn as he defends it with an open bat face towards point.

OUT! CAUGHT AND BOWLED! Flighted delivery on leg stump, turning away from the right hander, deceiving the batter in the flight. Jaker Ali closes his bat face as he looks to flick it into the leg side, the ball turns away and takes the leading edge, and goes back to the bowler, Vincent Masekesa, who takes a simple catch. He has got his second wicket now. Bangladesh are now 267/5, leading by 40 runs.
Jaker Ali (wk) c&b V Masekesa 5 (13b 1x4 0x6)
Fuller on middle, Jaker Ali defends it off the front foot.
Shortish delivery on off, Mushfiqur Rahim rocks back and slashes it to short extra cover.
Flighted delivery on off, Mushfiqur Rahim hangs back and blocks it.
Fuller and turning away, Mushfiqur Rahim leans forward and defends it off the front foot.
Short and well outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim plays the push to backward point.
Again a touch short on off, Mushfiqur Rahim hangs back and pushes it to short cover.
Short and outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim cuts it straight to point.
Tossed up on off, Jaker Ali blocks it back to the bowler.
Floated on off stump, Jaker Ali blocks it off the front foot.
Overpitched on middle, Jaker Ali nicely defends it off the front foot, right under his eyes.

Oh dear me! Did it slip out of the hands of Vincent Masekesa? Maybe. A waist-high full toss outside off, even Mushfiqur Rahim is surprised by it, but he manages to pull it along the ground to deep mid-wicket for a single.
Short and outside off, Jaker Ali taps it into the leg side and sets off for a quick single.
Short and outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim rocks back and cuts it to the left of short extra cover for a single.
Slower through the air, angled in and turning away, outside off, Jaker Ali leans forward and puts a stride in line of the ball as he defends this delivery with the turn.
Overpitched on off, Jaker Ali blocks it into the off side.
Fuller, given a bit of air, on off, Jaker Ali defends it off the front foot.
Short and turning away, just outside off, Jaker Ali stays back and defends it under his eyes.
Overpitched on off, Jaker Ali blocks it off the front foot.
Full on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim drives it to long off for a single.
A touch fuller, Jaker Ali leans forward and blocks it.

FOUR! Edged and runs away to the boundary. Zimbabwe almost had their 5th wicket! Tossed up just outside off, turning away, Jaker Ali puts a big stride forward to defend it, gets an outside edge, that just goes past the first slip and runs away to the boundary.

OUT! TAKEN! The debutant, Vincent Masekesa, has his first Test wicket. The beaming smile on his face says it all. Tossed up from around the wicket, full and around off, Najmul Hossain Shanto plants his front foot ahead and looks to play with the turn. The ball dips on Shanto and he is through his shot early. Lobs it towards short mid-wicket where Nick Welch stays low and manages to get his hands under the ball. Bangladesh are now 259/4, leading by 32 runs.
Najmul Hossain Shanto (c) c N Welch b V Masekesa 23 (54b 3x4 1x6)
Short and around leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto fails to help it away.
