Length ball in the channel of uncertainty, that ball didn't swing or seam, just went with the angle, Shadman Islam judges it well and leaves it alone.
A touch full again, Anamul Haque presents the full face of the bat as he defends it off the front foot.
A touch fuller on middle, Anamul Haque cautiously defends it to forward short leg.
Short on middle, Anamul Haque defends it off the back foot.
Quicker and fuller, outside off, Anamul Haque goes for the square drive but finds the fielder.
This time a touch quicker, but the length is again short, Anamul Haque stays back and punches it to short extra cover.
Slower through the air, shorter in length, Anamul Haque hangs back and pushes it short extra cover.
Short ball to finish the over from Blessing Muzarabani! Short aimed at the body, Shadman Islam ducks under it as he lets it go.
Length ball that skides off the surface and stays a touch low, in the channel outside off. That is a brave leave from Shadman Islam as the ball went just past the off stump.

Short ball on off, Shadman Islam goes for the pull and gets it just to the left of mid on and takes two runs as the mid on fielder cuts it off. Tell you what, he didn't middle it as the ball came a bit late on the bat.
Length ball angled into the left hander, on off, Shadman Islam hangs back and punches it to mid off.
Back of a length on off, Shadman Islam hops a bit as he pushes it to mid off.

FOUR! Overpitched on middle, Shadman Islam presents the full face of the bat as he punches it down the ground for four. The key was that he didn't over hit it and the timing on that shot was immaculate.
Full, given a lot of air, on off, Anamul Haque nicely blocks it off the front foot.
Tossed up, outside off, a touch fuller, Shadman Islam pushes it to the left of mid off and takes a single.
Fuller on middle, Shadman Islam blocks it right under his eyes.
A bit flatter and quicker, on middle, Shadman Islam looks to charge at it and has to curb the shot in the end as he somehow manages to defend it off the front foot.
Slower through the air, fuller on off, Shadman Islam commits on the front foot and drives it back to the bowler.
Tossed up on off, Shadman Islam comes forward and drives it mid on.
Length ball on off, Shadman Islam punches it to the left of mid off and takes a single.
Length ball outside off, Shadman Islam shoulders his arms to that one.
Length ball on off, Shadman Islam blocks it under his eyes.
FOUR! Poor delivery and punished! Short and outside off, Shadman Islam slashes at it, seeing the width on offer, and puts it away through the vacant covers region for four.
Length ball around off, Shadman Islam pushes it off the back foot to mid off.
Back of a length on middle, Shadman Islam gets behind the line of the ball and plays it towards catching mid on.

Flatter shorter and quicker, on off stump, Anamul Haque just about brings his bat in time as he plays the steer. The ball goes just past the first slip fielder and runs towards deep third region. Two runs taken.
Short and sliding down leg, going with the arm, Anamul Haque looks to flick it but can't connect.
A touch shorter on middle, Anamul Haque pushes it off the back foot, on the bounce to forward short leg.
Again overpitched, this time on middle stump, Anamul Haque comfortably pushes it back to the bowler.
Overpitched on leg, Anamul Haque pushes it to mid on.
Tossed up, around off, Anamul Haque gets a big stride forward and defends it to short cover.
Length ball on off, Shadman Islam presents the full face of the bat as he pushes it to the right of mid off, and takes two runs. The mid off fielder cuts it off.
Length ball angled in, in the channel outside off, Shadman Islam judges the line well and shoulders his arms to it.

Beaten! Length ball angled into the left hander, moves away a bit after pitching as the ball straightens. The line is in the corridor of uncertainty. Shadman Islam pokes at it and gets beaten on the outside edge. A bit of an appeal from the bowling side, but they decide against the review.
Full and hint of inswing for the bowler. The line is outside off, and hence Shadman Islam has no problems leaving it.
Length ball angled into the left hander, on middle leg, Shadman Islam works it off the back foot to catching mid on.
From round the wicket, back of a length on off, Shadman Islam hops on the back foot and pushes it back to the bowler.
Full and outside off, a harmless delivery, Anamul Haque has no problems in leaving it.
Length ball in the channel outside off, Anamul Haque leaves it alone.

FOUR! Wasn't the most convincing shot from Anamul Haque but he will take it! Length ball angled across again, outside off, Anamul Haque looks to steer it, and gets a bit of an under edge on it as the ball runs away between gully and slips for four.
Length ball angled across the right hander, in the channel outside off, Anamul Haque leaves it alone.
Back of a length in the corridor of uncertainty, Anamul Haque pokes at it and gets beaten on the outside edge.
Length ball on middle, Shadman Islam flicks it to the left of mid on and takes a single.

FOUR! Too predictable from Blessing Muzarabani! Short ball on middle, Anamul Haque was ready for it as he fierecely pulls it behind square and sends the ball racing to the boundary as the deep fine leg fielder had no chance to cut it off.

Extra bounce for Blessing Muzarabani! Back of a length, around off. Anamul Haque is cramped for room as he looks to defend the ball into the ground, he gets an outside edge that goes on the bounce to 2nd slip.
Again short of length ball just outside off, Anamul Haque hops a bit and defends it into the ground.
Back of a length ball angled into the right hander on middle, Anamul Haque blocks it off the back foot to mid off.
Length ball on middle, Anamul Haque defends it off the back foot, back to the bowler.

Back of a length on middle, Anamul Haque looks to work it off the back foot, but the ball hits the upper part of his bat and goes just over the short leg fielder, who puts up his right hand to catch it, but the ball evades him. Two runs taken.
Length ball on middle, Shadman Islam solidly blocks it off the front foot to mid off.

Length ball angling across the right hander, outside off, Anamul Haque looks to defend it off the front foot and gets an outside edge that rolls along the ground and goes in the gap between third slip and gully fielder. Single taken.
A touch fuller delivery, on off, Anamul Haque hangs back and blocks it, as he gets right behind the line of the ball.
Full on the pads, Shadman Islam flicks it along the ground to deep fine leg for a single.
Length ball on off, Shadman Islam leans on the front foot and defends it back to the bowler. Nicely defended.
FOUR! Streaky! Length ball, wide outside off, Shadman Islam slashes hard at it as the ball goes over the slip cordon for four.
Short ball around off, Anamul Haque ducks under it as he lets it go.
Short of a length delivery, on middle, Shadman Islam works it behind square off the back foot towards deep fine leg for a single.
Back of a length outside off, Shadman Islam lets it go.

Back of a length, just outside off, Anamul Haque defends it off the back foot as he opens his bat face a bit. The ball goes to the right of third slip who puts in a dive to stop the ball, and gets a hand to it. Batters run a single.

Short ball around off, Anamul Haque looks to duck under it and gets hit on the helmet. The ball lobs up in the air and goes over the slip cordon as it runs away from them. The fielders from the slip cordon run behind the ball and cut it off.
Length ball seaming into the right hander, Anamul Haque looks to work it into the leg side but gets hit on the pads.
Full and swinging away. The ball pitches on middle, and straightens a bit. Shadman Islam looks to flick it but gets a bit of leading edge that rolls along the ground, back to the bowler.
A half volley, just outside off, moving away slightly, Shadman Islam drives it off the front foot, straight to short cover.
Length ball, that shapes back in a touch, Shadman Islam puts a small stride forward and defends it towards short cover.
Back of a length on off stump, Shadman Islam hangs back and punches it towards point again.
On a length, just outside off, Shadman Islam punches it off the back foot through covers for two runs.
Short and wide outside off, swinging away, Shadman Islam slashes at it and hits it on the bounce, straight to point.

OUT! EDGED AND GONE! Excellent review from Bangladesh! Slower through the air, short in length, turning away, well outside off, Blessing Muzarabani pokes at it and the ball passes very close to the bat. The keeper, Jaker Ali, snaffles it cleanly. A loud appeal from Bangladesh's close-in fielders, but the on-field umpire is unmoved. Bangladesh decide to go for the review. Here's the third umpire on screen. UltraEdge shows a clear spike as the ball goes past the bat. The on-field call will be overturned and Zimbabwe have been bowled out for 227!
Blessing Muzarabani c J Ali b T Islam 2 (16b 0x4 0x6)

Slower through the air, tossed up above the eye line of the batter, on middle, Blessing Muzarabani is tempted seeing it as he swings across and connects it from the bottom part of his bat, to the right of deep mid-wicket for a single to end the day.
Short on middle leg, Blessing Muzarabani pushes it on the bounce to forward short leg.
Full on leg, Tafadzwa Tsiga flicks it to the left of short fine leg and takes a single. Now, Blessing Muzarabani has to survive last two balls of the day.
From round the wicket, on middle, Tafadzwa Tsiga covers the line of the ball and pushes it off the front foot, back to the bowler.
Fuller on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga again blocks it off the front foot.
Shorter on middle, Tafadzwa Tsiga puts a big stride forward and blocks it.
Full on middle, Blessing Muzarabani blocks it back to the bowler.
Full on off, Blessing Muzarabani looks to defend it, but the ball turns away and hits the outter half of his bat and goes into the off side.
Overpitched on off, Blessing Muzarabani defends it under his eyes.
Quicker and flatter outside off, Blessing Muzarabani blocks it to short cover.
Slower and shorter, turning away, Blessing Muzarabani defends through the line but the ball turns away and goes past his outside edge.
Tossed up, outside off, turning away, Blessing Muzarabani goes for the cover drive and gets beaten on the outside edge.
Length ball around off, Tafadzwa Tsiga plays the off drive to mid off.
Length ball on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga defends it back to the bowler.
Length ball around off, Tafadzwa Tsiga drives it to mid off.
Full on middle, Tafadzwa Tsiga blocks it to mid on.

Length ball on middle, Tafadzwa Tsiga flicks it towards deep mid-wicket and calls for two. The fielder from deep mid-wicket runs in and gets to the ball, but the batters are quick enough to get back in time as the fielder fires in a throw at the non-striker's end.
Length ball on middle, Tafadzwa Tsiga presents the full face of the bat as he defends it to mid on.
Short on middle, Blessing Muzarabani hangs back and pushes it to short cover. Blessing Muzarabani survives all 6 balls, and Tafadzwa Tsiga will breathe a sigh of relief.
Short length delivery that goes with the arm, Blessing Muzarabani lets it go as the ball just goes past the off stump. Oh, that was so near to crashing into the off stump.
Short and outside off, Blessing Muzarabani leaves it alone.
Again full on middle, Blessing Muzarabani again leans forward and defends it under his eyes.
Full on middle, Blessing Muzarabani prods forward and defends it into the off side.
Full on leg, Blessing Muzarabani eases it out to short mid-wicket as he flicks it.

Length ball deliberately fired well outside off, Tafadzwa Tsiga reaches out for it but can't get any bat on it. So he can't keep the strike and Taijul Islam will have the opportunity to wrap this innings up in the next over!
FOUR! That is a shot and a half! Short ball on middle, Tafadzwa Tsiga rocks on the back foot and pulls it along the ground to the right of short mid-wicket and picks up four runs.
Length ball, outside off, Tafadzwa Tsiga looks to cut it and under edges it on the bounce to gully.
Full on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga straight drives it as he presents the full face of the bat, but it goes straight to mid off. Ah, that was timed so well!
Full on pads, Blessing Muzarabani flicks it to deep mid-wicket for a single.
Length ball on middle leg, Tafadzwa Tsiga flicks it along the ground in the gap between deep mid-wicket and deep square leg for a single.

OUT! CLEANED HIM UP! Taijul Islam has his fifth wicket! 16th five-wicket haul in Test cricket for Taijul. Floated up, full from around the wicket, on the off stump, Nick Welch is lured into the big shot. Gets down on a knee and goes for the slog sweep. The ball sneaks under the blade to crash into the stumps. Nick cannot add anything to score post his return.
Nick Welch b T Islam 54 (133b 3x4 2x6)
Speared in, short and on middle, Nick Welch hangs back to keep it out.
Sliding onto the pads, on a nagging length, Tafadzwa Tsiga flicks it past backward square leg for a single.
Slows it down, full and on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga smothers the spin.
Floated up, full and on middle, Tafadzwa Tsiga knocks it to mid on.

OUT! Run out! Oh dear! Tossed up on middle skips down the track and flicks it to the left of deep mid-wicket. The call is for two from the striker, Vincent Masekesa was not convinced but he obliges in the end and looks to get back to the non-striker's end. The deep mid-wicket fielder, Mehidy Hasan Miraz is quick enough to cut it off and he release a very good throw at the non-striker’s end. Taijul Islam does the rest. Oh Dear Vincent Masekesa was not even in the frame!
Vincent Masekesa run out (Mehidy Hasan Miraz / Taijul Islam) 8 (14b 1x4 0x6)
Back of a length around off, Vincent Masekesa this time manages to evade the point fielder as he punches it to his left. Two runs taken.
Length ball, that skids through off the pitch, on off, Vincent Masekesa presents full face of the bat and guides it to point.
Length ball angled into the right hander on middle, Vincent Masekesa flicks it along the ground to short square leg.
Back of a length and outside off, Vincent Masekesa punches it on the bounce to point fielder.
Length ball, outside off, Vincent Masekesa pushes it off the crease, without any foot work.
Back of a length angled into the right hander just outside off, Vincent Masekesa goes feeling for it as the ball sneaks past his inside edge and goes through to the keeper.
Pushed away for a single by Vincent Masekesa.
On off, kept out by Vincent Masekesa.
Vincent Masekesa has just blocked that from the crease.
That is defended solidly off the front foot.
Four! Nicely done. Vincent Masekesa goes back in the crease, waits for the ball to arrive and then flicks it away for a boundary.
Played towards covers by Vincent Masekesa.
Short length on off, Tsiga pushes it to mid off.
Full and quick on middle, Tafadzwa Tsiga solidly defends it off the front foot.
A touch shorter on middle, Tafadzwa Tsiga pushes it on the bounce to forward short leg.
Full on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga drives it to short cover.
Overpitched on off, Vincent Masekesa puts a big stride forward and defends it to the left of mid off and takes a single.
Full on middle, Tafadzwa Tsiga drives it down the ground to long on for a single.
Tosses it up, full and on off, Vincent Masekesa gets half-forward to defend and the ball goes a bit uppishly but falls wide of the man at silly point.

OUT! CLEANED HIM UP! Two in two for Taijul Islam! This does not turn at all and keeps straight, on a nagging length, on the off stump, Richard Ngarava plays for the turn and ends up defending inside the line of the ball. The ball sneaks past the outside edge to clatter into the top of the off stump. 4th wicket for Taijul and he is on a hat-trick now.
Richard Ngarava b T Islam 0 (1b 0x4 0x6)

OUT! LBW! Taijul Islam is on a roll! Slower through the air, shorter in length, turning into the left hander, Wellington Masakadza walks a bit across and looks to flick it, but misses. The ball crashes into his front pad and a loud appeal follows. The umpire gives it.  Wellington Masakadza consults his partner and goes for the review. Here's the third umpire on screen. Pitching outside off, impact in line and wickets hitting on Ball Tracking. Three reds and Zimbabwe lose their 6th!
Wellington Masakadza lbw T Islam 6 (9b 0x4 1x6)
SIX! Clean hit! Wow, that has come out of nowhere! Flighted on off, Wellington Masakadza goes the aerial route as he slog sweeps this one over the cow corner region for a six.
Slower and turning into the left hander, Wellington Masakadza works it off the back foot to short square leg.
Full on off, Wellington Masakadza defends it back to the bowler.
Short and down leg again, Tafadzwa goes for the pull as he rocks on the back foot and misses.
Short and down the leg side, Tafadzwa Tsiga looks to work it into the leg side but ends up defending in the end.
Nicely bowled! Slower and short on leg, Tafadzwa Tsiga goes on the back foot but is beaten on the turn as he can't work it into the leg side.
Slower through the air, turning in, on middle and leg, Tafadzwa Tsiga defends it into the ground.
Full and outside off, Tafadzwa Tsiga pushes it to short cover.
Full on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga pushes it to mid off off the front foot.
Short and sliding down leg. Wellington Masakadza lets it go.
Very full, on off, Wellington Masakadza blocks it to short cover.

Slower through the air, tossing it up above the batter's eye line, the ball pitches on off stump and turns into the left hander, Wellington Masakadza looks to leave it but the ball hits his front leg. Perhaps it is going down leg and hence no appeal from the bowling side.
More fuller on off, Wellington Masakadza blocks it off the front foot.
Flighted delivery turning into the left hander, on off, Wellington Masakadza prods forward and defends it under his eyes.

OUT! CAUGHT! Taijul Islam has been very disciplined with his bowling and has rightfully deserved the wicket. Slower through the air, drifting into the right hander on middle, Wessly Madhevere looks to defend it off the front foot as he defends it through the line, but the ball spins away and takes the outside edge on its way to the wicket-keeper Jaker Ali, who takes a sharp catch.
Wessly Madhevere c J Ali b T Islam 15 (32b 2x4 0x6)
Short on the pads, Tafadzwa Tsiga works it off the back foot to short mid-wicket. No run.
Slower through the air, full, on middle leg, Wessly Madhevere now charges down the track and plays the push drive to long on. This is good positive batting from the duo.
Tossed up on middle, Tafadzwa Tsiga skips down the track, gets to the pitch of the ball and drives it to long on for a single.
Full on middle, this time Wessly Madhevere flicks it to the left of short fine leg and takes a single.
Slower through the air, short in length, turning away into the right hander on leg stump, Wessly Madhevere works it off the back foot to short fine leg.
Short on off, Wessly Madhevere blocks it right under his eyes.
Tossed up delivery, on middle, Tafadzwa defends it from the crease.
Flighted and outside off, Tafadzwa Tsiga puts his front foot in line of the ball and defends it into the ground.
Tossed up delivery, on the off stump, Tafadzwa pushes it off the front foot to mid off.
A touch short and outside off, turning away a bit, Tafadzwa Tsiga puts a small stride ahead and defends it.
Full on middle, Tafadzwa Tsiga defends it back to the bowler.
FOUR! Good wrist work from Tafadzwa Tsiga! Full on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga whips it along the ground to right of mid on for four.
FOUR! Lovely from Wessly Madhevere! Overpitched just outside off, Wessly Madhevere puts a stride forward and drives it through extra cover region for four.
Tossed up, just outside off, Tafadzwa Tsiga defends it off the front foot with soft hands and takes a quick single.
Tossed up on middle, Wessly Madhevere comes down the track and drives it to long on for a single.
Full on leg, Wessly Madhevere takes a stride forward and defends it.
Full on middle, Wessly Madhevere blocks it back to the bowler.
Tossed up on middle leg, Wessly Madhevere looks to defend it off the front foot and the ball takes the inside edge and runs down towards deep fine leg region. Two runs taken.
Loopy delivery, very full, on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga blocks it out.
Speared in, full and on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga drives it straight to cover.
Short and on the pads, Wessly Madhevere tucks it to deep square leg for a single.
Full and on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga gets on the front foot and pats it in front of mid off for a quick single.
Floated up, full and on off, driven to mid off.
On off, on a nagging length, Tafadzwa Tsiga presses forward to defend.
Fuller and slower, on off, Wessly Madhevere steps out and plays it to mid-wicket.
Drags the length back, on middle, Wessly Madhevere stays back to keep it out.
Full and on off, Wessly Madhevere clips it to mid-wicket.
Full and on off, Wessly Madhevere gets forward to defend.
FOUR! Good use of the feet! Floated up, full and around off, Wessly Madhevere gets to the pitch of the ball and eases the drive past cover for a boundary.
Short and on off, Wessly Madhevere gets behind the line to block.
Drifting in, full and on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga gets half-forward to smother the spin.
Fired in, very full, Tafadzwa Tsiga jams it out.
Play and a miss! Fuller and slower, outside off, Tafadzwa Tsiga goes for the big booming drive and gets beaten.
Beaten! Nicely tossed up, full and around off, Tafadzwa Tsiga is lured into the drive and gets beaten on the outside edge.
Shorter and on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga hangs back to pat it down on the off side.
Floated up, full and on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga gets on the front foot to keep it out.
Short and around leg, Wessly Madhevere goes back to flick but misses and wears it on the pads.
Sliding down leg, Wessly Madhevere leaves the ball alone.
Short and on middle, Wessly Madhevere turns it to square leg.
Full and around off, Wessly Madhevere defends.
Tosses it up, full and on off, Wessly Madhevere pushes it off the front foot back to the bowler.
Short and on middle, Wessly Madhevere gets behind the line to block.
Turning away, on a nagging length, Tafadzwa Tsiga lets it be.
Slower and shorter, on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga solidly defends.
Pushed through, full and on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga stabs it down on the off side.
Tosses it up, full and on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga gets forward to block.
This grips and turns away, short and on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga is squared up in defence but manages to keep it out.
Short and on off, Wessly Madhevere punches it in front of mid off for a quick single.

A huge shout for LBW but turned down! Nayeem Hasan indicates that the ball would have gone over the stumps and Bangladesh do not go for the review. Nayeem hangs it up there, on middle, Tafadzwa Tsiga gets a stride forward to defend but fails to smother the spin. The ball spins back in to go past the inside edge and catches him on the front pad. The Ball Tracking is in and it shows umpire's call on impact as well as it is clipping the stumps.
Full and turning into the pads, Tafadzwa Tsiga keeps it out on the leg side.
Slows it down and drags the length back, on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga gets forward to defend.
Floated up, full and on off, Tafadzwa Tsiga lunges to block it out.

OUT! CAUGHT! An absolute blinder from Tanzim Hasan Sakib and one brings two for Bangladesh! An innocuous delivery from Nayeem Hasan, full and straying onto the pads, Sean Williams gets down on a knee and goes hard on the sweep. Fails to keep the shot along the ground and it flies more of a top edge towards backward square leg. Tanzim leaps to his left and plucks it out of thin air with both hands.
Sean Williams c TH Sakib b N Hasan 67 (166b 7x4 1x6)
Full and on the pads, swept straight to backward square leg.
Short and on the pads, jabbed to mid-wicket off the back foot.
A bit of away drift, full and on off, Wessly Madhevere defends it off the outer half of the bat.
This keeps straight, short and around off, Wessly Madhevere pushes it back to Mehidy.
Short and turning into the pads, Wessly Madhevere helps it off the back foot to short fine leg.
On off, on a length, Wessly Madhevere lunges to push it back to Mehidy.
Short and wide on off, Sean Williams slaps it to deep cover for a single.
Turning back in sharply, on middle and leg, on the shorter side, Wessly Madhevere manages to tuck it down in front of short leg.
Short and turning in, on off, Wessly Madhevere hangs back to defend.
Floated up, full and on middle, Wessly Madhevere clips it off the front foot to mid-wicket.

OUT! EDGED AND GONE! Nayeem Hasan has his reward! This is pushed through, short and outside off. The width is there for Craig Ervine to cash in and he rocks back to cut it away. The ball stays a bit low and grazes the bottom edge. The keeper, Jaker Ali keeps his gloves in the correct position and snaffles it. Ervine falls for 5 (31). Zimbabwe are now 177/3.
Craig Ervine (c) c J Ali b N Hasan 5 (31b 1x4 0x6)
On off, Craig Ervine gets on the front foot to dab it down.
Loopy delivery, full and outside off, Sean Williams reaches out in front and eases it past cover for one.
Full and on the off stump, Craig Ervine presses forward to block.
Slows it down, shorter and on middle, tucked to mid-wicket.
Serves the arm ball, on middle, Craig Ervine gets his bat out in front to keep it out.
This stays a bit low, on the shorter side, whipped through mid-wicket for a single by Sean.
SIX! Launched down the ground! Mehidy Hasan Miraz errs in length as he serves a bit too full, on off, Sean Williams gets down on a knee and pumps it over long on for a biggie.
Speared in, on a nagging length, on middle, Sean Williams blocks it out.
A bit quicker and outside off again, Craig Ervine shoulders arms.
Turning away, outside off, Craig Ervine lets it be.
FOUR! Easy pickings! Sprayed on the pads from around the wicket, Craig Ervine makes use of the angle and just tickles it down to the deep fine leg fence for a boundary.
Fuller and on off, Craig Ervine is solid in defence this time.
Turn and bounce! Drifting in, on a length, Craig Ervine gets half-forward to defend but the ball spins away and with a bit of extra bounce, goes past the outside edge.
From around the wicket, lands it on the off stump line, Craig Ervine defends it right under his eyes.
Fractionally short, on off, Sean Williams dabs it to point from the crease.
Bowled from wide of the crease, on a nagging length, left alone by Sean.
Tossed up, on off, Sean Williams lunges to smother the spin.
Full and around off, driven firmly to cover.
A bit of turn on this one, on off, on a length, Sean Williams gets forward to defend and gets it off the outer half to backward point.
At 86.4 kph, full and on off, Sean Williams stays back to push it to cover.
On off, flat and short, Craig Ervine covers the line and solidly defends.
Darted in at the pads, Craig Ervine keeps it out on the leg side.
Looped up, full and outside off, Craig Ervine lets it be.
On off, on the fuller side, Craig Ervine stabs it down the deck.
Fuller and quicker, on middle, Craig Ervine nudges it to square leg.
Short and on off, Craig Ervine hangs back to defend.
Shorter and flatter, on off, Sean Williams steers it to backward point.
A bit of grip on this one, on off, on a nagging length, Sean Williams covers the line and dabs it down on the off side.
Around off, on a nagging length, Sean Williams gets a stride in to keep it out.
On off, on a nagging length, Sean Williams gets his bat out in front to push it back to Mehidy.
Full and on the pads, Craig Ervine whips it wide of mid on for a single.
Pushed through, full and on middle, Craig Ervine keeps his bat close to the front pad to defend.
Full on middle, Sean Williams defends it with full face of the bat.
Fuller and outside off, turning away, Sean Williams leaves it alone.
Floated around off, Sean Williams blocks it under his eyes.
Again a touch fuller, just outside off, Sean Williams puts a big stride forward and pushes it back to the bowler.
Overpitches it this time does Nayeem Hasan, Sean Williams has no problems with it as he blocks it easily off the front foot.
Angled in on leg stump, shorter in length and turning away on middle, Sean Williams defends it patiently as late as possible.
Now quicker and fuller on middle, Craig Ervine defends it without much feet movement. Nice over from Mehidy Hasan Miraz as he varied his pace beautifully in that over.
A touch fuller just outside off, Craig Ervine is solid in his defence as he defends it to short cover.
Slower again, on the shorter side, Craig Ervine hangs back and punches it back to the bowler.
Floated up around off, Craig Ervine defends it under his eyes off the front foot.
Slower through the air, fuller on middle, Craig Ervine skips down the track and drives it to mid on.
Flatter and quicker, fuller on middle, Craig Ervine defends it to mid on.
Again some turn! Slower through the air, pitching on off, and turning away just outside off, Sean Williams gets a nice stride forward and defends it off the front foot.
Overpitched, just outside off, Sean Williams blocks it off the front foot.
Slower through the air and outside off, fuller, turning away, Sean Williams leaves it alone.
Slower through the air, shorter, just outside off, Sean Williams hangs back and punches it to point.
Overpitched on off, Sean Williams drives it back to the bowler.
Turn, bounce and drift! A peach of a delivery! A touch full on middle, turning away from the left hander, as it squares up Sean Williams on the forward defence and goes past the outside edge.
Overpitched on off, Craig Ervine puts a stride forward and pushes it back to the bowler.
Full on middle, Craig Ervine pushes it off the front foot to catching mid on.
Short and turning away, Sean Williams hangs back and punches it along the ground to deep extra cover for a single.
A bit quicker through the air, a touch shorter, Sean Williams defends it off the front foot.
Full on off, Sean Williams blocks it back to the bowler.
Overpitched on off, Sean Williams drives it to mid off.
Flatter and fuller on off, turning away, Craig Ervine looks to defend it off the front foot and gets an outside edge on it, as the ball goes rolling along the ground to short third man.
Short and wide outside off, Sean Williams cuts it to the right of short extra cover, who dives and saves potential 3 runs. Single taken.
Slower through the air, shorter, on middle, Sean Williams hangs back and pushes it on the bounce to forward short leg.
A touch short on middle, Sean Williams pushes it to mid on.
Fuller on off, Sean Williams pushes it to short cover.
Slower through the air, just outside off, Sean Williams prods forward and defends it back to the bowler.
A touch full, on middle, Craig Ervine presents full face of the bat as he pushes it to catching mid on.
Fuller, on off, Craig Ervine blocks it with half a stride forward.
A touch fuller on off, Craig Ervine defends it back to the bowler.
Short length off break on middle, Nick Welch puts a stride forward and pushes it to short mid on.
Again a touch full, goes on with the arm, Sean Williams leans forward to defend and the ball takes the inside half of the bat and goes into the leg side. Batters run a single.
Flatter and quicker on off, Sean Williams prods forward and defends it back to the bowler.
Fired in, full and on off, Nick Welch gets his bat out in front to defend. That will be TEA on Day 1!
From wide of the crease, this keeps slow and low, Nick Welch watches it carefully and defends.
Floated up, full and on off, Nick Welch leans forward and pats it to cover.
Short and turning into the pads, Sean Williams whips it away through backward square leg for a single.
Gives the ball air, full and on middle, Sean Williams goes back to defend.
Short and turning into the pads, Sean Williams flicks it away to short fine leg.
Another one that keeps straight, around off, Nick Welch keeps it out off the front foot.
On off, this is pushed through, Nick Welch is solid in defence.
Full and straight, at the stumps, Nick Welch nudges it to square leg.
Tosses it up, full and at the stumps, Nick Welch plants his front foot across and dabs it down on the leg side.
Full and on off, Nick Welch lunges to defend.
Short and on middle, Nick Welch hangs back and tucks it to mid-wicket.
Full and on off, Nick Welch pushes it wide of cover for a single.
Darted in, full and on off, Nick Welch blocks it out off the front foot.
This stays low, shorter and slower, outside off, Nick Welch rocks back for the cut but chops it down on the off side.
More loop on this one, wide as well, Nick Welch leaves the ball alone.
Looped up, full and on off, Nick Welch drives it to cover.
Short and outside off, Nick Welch lets it be.
Short and on off, Sean Williams dabs it down on the off side.
This skids through but keeps a bit low, short and on off, Sean Williams keeps it out.
Full and on off, Sean Williams pats it down on the off side.
Fuller and quicker, on the off stump, Sean Williams defends it off the front foot.
Short and around off, Sean Williams backs away a bit and steers it late to the right of short third for a couple of runs.
Pushed through, full and at the stumps, Sean Williams blocks it out off the front foot.
Short and on off, Nick Welch pats it to cover.
Darted in, full and attacking the front pad, Nick Welch gets his bat out in front to block.
Tossed up, full and on off, Sean Williams drives it to deep cover for a single.
Turning back in sharply, short and on middle, Sean Williams stays back to keep it out.
Floated up, full and on off, Nick Welch steps out and plays it in front of mid off for a quick single.
Short and on middle, Sean Williams punches it to long on and crosses over.
A loud shout for LBW but turned down! Mehidy Hasan Miraz drops it short and on middle, Nick Welch hangs back to whip it away but ekes out an inside edge onto the pads.
FIFTY FOR WILLIAMS! 5th Test half-century for Sean. A fifty in the first innings in Sylhet and he has got one here too. Short and outside off, Sean Williams cuts it away to deep point for a single.
Full and on off, Sean Williams gets a good stride in and pushes it to cover.
Short and turning into the pads, Nick Welch works it wide of mid-wicket for a single.
Tossed up, full and on off, Sean Williams pats it to mid off and takes a quick single.
Short and around off, Sean Williams cuts it well but can't get it past the diving short cover fielder.
Short and on middle, Sean Williams punches it past cover for a single.
Full and on middle, Sean Williams knocks it to mid on.
Looped up, full and on middle, Sean Williams lunges to clip it away but misses and catches it on the front pad.
Turning down leg, on the shorter side, Sean Williams tries to help it away but misses.
Short and wide on off, cut away to deep point for a single by Welch.
Tosses it up, on off, Nick Welch lunges to defend.
Lands it on a good length, on off, Sean Williams covers the line and pushes it to cover.
Over middle, on a back of a length, Sean Williams blocks it out off the back foot.
NO BALL! Straying on the pads, on a back of a length, Sean Williams misses the flick and wears it on the pads.
FOUR! Skillfully done! On a short of a good length, over off, Sean Williams gets on his toes and steers it with an open bat face wide of backward point for a boundary.
On a hard length, on middle and leg, Sean Williams stabs it out on the leg side.
Delivers it on a back of a length, over off, Sean Williams swivels and pulls it through backward square leg for a couple of runs.
Nails the yorker, on middle, Sean Williams does well to get his bat down in time.
Full and on off, Nick Welch gets forward to defend.

FIFTY FOR WELCH! Nick has looked busy ever since his arrival and he will look to convert this into a big score. 2nd half-century of Welch's Test career. Short and around off, Nick Welch punches at the ball and gets an outside edge that goes wide of backward point for a couple.
Tossed up, full on off, Nick Welch taps it on the bounce to silly point.
Short and turning away, on off, Nick Welch pushes it to cover.
Floated up, on off, Nick Welch lunges to block.
Very full, on middle, Nick Welch eases it to mid on.
Honing in on the stumps, on a good length, Sean Williams gets behind the line and dabs it down.
Fuller in length, on off, knocked to mid off.
From around the wicket, around off, on a good length, Sean Williams dabs it down on the off side.
FOUR! Class written all over it! Pitched up from over the wicket, on off, Sean Williams extends his hands into the shot and drives it to the right of short cover for a boundary.
Sprayed down leg, on a length, Sean Williams misses the tickle.
On a short of a length, on off, Sean Williams stabs it out.

Speared in from around the wicket, short and this grips away. Nick Welch is squared up as the ball goes past the outside edge on his defence. Wears it on the back pad but the impact seemed outside the line. Well, the Ball Tracking shows that the impact was umpire's call and the ball was going past the off stump.
From wide of the crease, this straightens a bit, on off, Nick Welch defends it solidly.
On off, on a length, Nick Welch gets his bat out in front to keep it out.
Slows it down, full and on off, Nick Welch lunges to smother the spin.
Short and on middle, Nick Welch punches it back to the bowler.
Floated up, full and on middle, blocked out.
This is on a back of a length, on middle, turned away to square leg.
On the fuller side, angling away, Sean Williams leaves the ball alone.
FOUR! Glorious! On a hard length, on off, Sean Williams rides the bounce as he gets on his toes and punches it sweetly through covers for a boundary.
Going across, on a nagging length, Sean Williams defends it with soft hands. Gets an outside edge that goes along the ground to the slip cordon.
FOUR! Thumped! Hasan Mahmud goes into the wicket, over off, Sean Williams swivels and cracks the pull through square leg for a boundary.
Angling across, on a good length, Sean Williams defends it right under his eyes.
Overpitched on off, Nick Welch gets a big stride forward and defends it right under his eyes. And that will be drinks!
Full on off, Nick Welch looks to take full toll of it as he drives this through the extra cover region for two runs.
Turn and bounce! Slower and a touch shorter on off, Nick Welch hangs back as he looks to block it off the back foot. The ball takes the outside edge and goes wide of the first slip fielder.
Floated around off, Nick Welch looks to flick it and almost gets squared up as the leading edge goes rolling along the ground to short cover.
Slower through the air, on off, Nick Welch again defends it nicely off the front foot.
Tossed up on off, Nick Welch leans forward and blocks it.
Short and aimed at the body, Sean Williams ducks under it as he lets it go.
Good length delivery angled into the left hander, Sean Williams stays back and looks to block it under his eyes, but the ball takes the inside edge and hits his pads.
From round the wicket, a harmless length ball, well outside off, Sean Williams leaves it alone.
Pushed across the left-hander, on a short of a length, Sean Williams lets it be.
Angling across, on a length, Sean Williams drives it to cover.
On a hard length, on the pads, glanced down to deep fine leg for a single.
Short and on off, Sean Williams hangs back to defend.

Floated up, on off, Nick Welch does not get to the pitch of the ball but still goes through with the drive. Checks his shot and plays it a but uppishly well wide of the bowler to his left for a single.
Flatter and shorter, orthodox delivery, on off, Nick Welch blocks it back to the bowler.
Shorter on middle, Sean Williams hangs back and works it to the right of short mid-wicket for a single.
A touch fuller and outside off, Sean Williams nicely leans forward and blocks it into the off side.
Sharp turn! Short and flat turning into the left hander, on leg stump, Sean Williams looks to work it off the back foot and gets hit on the back leg.
Length ball, on off, a touch inward movement on it, Nick Welch nicely gets his bat in line of his front pad and defends it back to the bowler.
Back of a length seaming into the right hander, Nick Welch is again late in bringing his bat down as the ball hits him near the thigh pad area.
Back of a length on middle, Nick Welch works it along the ground to mid on.
On a length around off, Nick Welch hangs back and blocks it to short cover.
Length ball seaming into the right hander, just outside off, Nick Welch leaves it alone. Wow that's a good leave.

Length ball, on middle, Nick Welch is late to play the flick as the ball goes past his inside edge and almost goes between his legs as the ball hits him near the thigh pad area and goes near the stumps. Oh that was close.

FOUR! Second boundary of the over! Short and outside off, Sean Williams cuts it with fast hands and finds the gap as the ball evades the point fielder and goes for four. With that boundary, fifty run partnership comes up for the duo.
A touch shorter, on off, Sean Williams pushes it off the back foot to short cover.
Quicker and shorter on middle, Sean Williams stays back and pushes it into the leg side.
A touch quicker now, on off, Sean Williams stands tall as he defends it back to the bowler.
FOUR! Sean Williams breaks the shackles with a big hit! Slower through the air just outside off, Sean Williams brings out the slog sweep as he sends the ball on the bounce to the mid-wicket fence.
Slower and shorter, on middle leg, Sean Williams pushes it across the line to short mid-wicket.
Quicker and flatter on off, Nick Welch judges it nicely as he leans on the front foot and defends it back to the bowler.
Short and slower through the air, just outside off, Nick Welch stays back and pushes it into the ground.
Fuller on off, Nick Welch solidly defends it off the front foot to short cover.
Overpitched on middle leg, Nick Welch drives it to mid on.
Slower through the air and outside off, turning away, Nick Welch leaves it alone.
Flatter and quicker, orthodox delivery, on off, Nick Welch gets a big stride forward and blocks it.
Short again, on off, Sean Williams hangs back and defends it under his eyes.
A touch short on off, Sean Williams again gets his bat in line of his front foot and defends it nicely to short cover.
Full and just outside off, Sean Williams defends it off the front foot to short cover.
Overpitched on middle, Sean Williams gets a stride forward and defends it off the front foot.
Short this time, on off, Sean Williams gets behind the line of it and blocks it under his eyes.

Tossed up just outside off, turning away, Sean Williams leans on the front foot and plays it with soft hands as the ball catches the outside edge and runs fine of the short third man fielder who runs behind it and cuts it off. Two runs taken.
A touch full on off, Nick Welch puts a stride forward and defends it back to the bowler.
Tossed up, around off, turning away in the channel outside off, Nick Welch watches it carefully as he lets it go.
Full on off, Nick Welch gets right behind the line of the ball as he defends it back to the bowler.
A touch overpitched on leg, Nick Welch blocks it off the front foot.

Flighted delivery turning away, just outside off, inviting the batter to drive, Nick Welch looks to drive it off the front foot and gets an outside edge that goes wide of the first slip and runs to the left of short third man. Two runs taken.
Tossed up on middle, Nick Welch drives it back to the bowler.
Quicker and flatter, just outside off, Sean Williams hangs back and pushes it to point fielder. No run.
Fuller on middle, Sean Williams leans forward and defends it back to the bowler.
Again a similar delivery Sean Williams punches it off the back foot to short cover.
Fuller on off, Sean Williams leans forward and defends it to short cover.
Quicker and a touch short on off, Sean Williams blocks it off the back foot, back to the bowler.
Short and turning away, outside off, Sean Williams hangs back and defends it to point.
A touch short length orthodox delivery on middle, Nick Welch blocks it to mid on. No run.
Shorter and turing away around off, Nick Welch hangs back and blocks it to silly point on the bounce.
Again quicker but short, Nick Welch blocks it solidly back to the bowler.
A bit flat and quick on off, Nick Welch prods forward and defends it to catching mid off.
Fuller on off, Sean Williams leans forward and pushes it to the left of short cover for a single.
Floaty orthodox delivery turning into the left hander, stays low a bit, Sean Williams does well to bring his bat down in time as he defends it.
Short and turning down leg, Nick Welch flicks it to short fine leg.
Shorter on middle, Nick Welch this time hangs back and blocks it right under his eyes.
Floated on middle, Nick Welch skips down the track and pushes it back to the bowler.
Tossed up on middle, Sean Williams flicks to the left of mid on for a single.
Tossed up on off, a bit of turn, Sean Williams prods forward and defends it to point.
Short length off break on off, Sean Williams blocks it to short cover.

A huge mix-up but no harm done! Short on middle and leg, Sean Williams flicks it towards short fine leg and Nick Welch sets off for a quick single. Shadman Islam throws it at the striker's end, which is the wrong end as Welch gets in easily. Sean Williams was not even halfway through at that point and stutters before getting his feet tangled and tripping over. Eventually, he accepts the call and starts running towards the non-striker's end and completes the run as he was off balance.
Short and on the leg stump, Sean Williams looks to work it off the back foot but misses it as the ball hits his back leg.
Tossed up on middle, Nick Welch pushes it to the right of mid on for a single.
Short again on leg, Sean Williams works it behind the wicket towards deep fine leg for a single.

Short and down leg, Sean Williams pulls it along the ground, in the gap between deep square leg and deep mid-wicket. Hasan Mahmud from deep mid-wicket runs to his left and puts in a dive as he saves two runs.

A touch short, turning into the left hander, Sean Williams flicks it to the left of short mid-wicket and looks for a single. The man at short mid-wicket was quick enough to cut it off. The non-striker sends him back in time.
Tosssed up on off, Nick Welch charges down the track and drives it straight to mid off.

FOUR! Driven away! Nothing wrong with the delivery but just a good cricket shot from Nick Welch. A touch fuller off break, just outside off, Nick Welch leans on the front foot and drives this through vacant covers region for four.
Again a touch short on middle, Nick Welch solidly defends it off the front foot back to the bowler.
Short on middle, Sean Williams rocks back and works this to the right of short mid-wicket for a single.
Short and turning away, outside off, Sean Williams cuts it straight to point.
Short length off break on off, Sean Williams gets right behind the line of it and blocks it under his eyes.
Full on off, Nick Welch blocks it back to the bowler.

Short and turning into the left hander on middle, Sean Williams flicks this one right through the legs of forward short leg and takes a single. Oh that ball could have gone straight to the hands, lucky for Sean Williams.
A touch full on off, Nick Welch pushes it off the front foot to the left of short cover for a single. He didn't time that well.
Short and drifting on the pads, Sean Williams tucks it behind square for a single.
Short and on off, Nick Welch works it off the back foot to the right of mid on and takes a single.
Tossed up just outside off, turning away and Nick Welch leaves it alone. That's a brave leave!
Short length off break on middle, Sean Williams tucks it to short mid-wicket.
Full on middle, Sean Williams cautiously defends it off the front foot into the leg side.

Short length off break that pitches on middle stump and straightens a touch. Sean Williams leaves it alone and the ball hits his pads. Oh, that's a risky leave. A loud appeal and not given, but Bangladesh decide against the review. Probably going over the stumps. Well, the Ball Tracking is in and it would have been umpire's call with the ball clipping the leg stump.
Short in length just outside off, Sean Williams punches it off the back foot to short cover.
A touch short again, Sean Williams hangs back and defends it to short cover.
Short and wide outside off, Sean Williams cuts it straight to short extra cover.

Short length delivery on off, that stays low, Sean Williams manages to get his bat down in time as he late cuts it fine of short third man. The short third man fielder runs behind the ball and cuts it off. Batters run three.
A touch fuller on middle, Sean Williams defends it to mid on.

Another short length orthodox delivery on middle, Sean Williams looks to flick it, but misses it, as the ball hits the straps of his front pad and goes in the hands of leg slip. Appeal follows but it has clearly not hit his bat.
A touch shorter on off, Sean Williams flicks it to short mid-wicket.
Nice and tight full-length delivery on off, Sean Williams defends it off the front foot.
Short, outside off, Nick Welch flat bats it to the right of mid on, who puts in a dive and gets a hand to it but doesn’t stop it properly as the ball eventually evades him. Batters run three.
Well outside off, on the shorter side, Sean Williams leaves the ball alone. That will be LUNCH on Day 1!
Back to bowling it full, on off, Sean Williams defends with his bat close to the front pad.
Drags the length back, on off, Sean Williams gets on top of it and punches it to cover.
Floated up, on the fuller side, Sean Williams lunges to defend
Flat and short, on off, kept out off the back foot by Sean Williams.
Turn and bounce for Nayeem, on off, Sean Williams rides the bounce to keep it out.
Keeps it wide on off, Nick Welch leans forward and pats it down on the off side.
Gets it full, on off, Nick Welch smothers the spin as he gets on the front foot.
Full and wide on off, Nick Welch reaches out and drives it wide of point for a couple of runs.
Outside off, left alone by Nick Welch.
On off, on the shorter side, Nick Welch stabs it out.
Short and on off, Nick Welch stays back to defend.
Turning into the pads, Nick Welch clips it past short leg for a single.
FOUR! Innovative and Nick Welch gets the reward! Hasan floats it up, on off, Nick brings out the reverse and hits it firmly along the ground to the left of deep point for a boundary.
Fuller and slower, on off, Nick Welch presses forward to block.
Pushes it through, on a nagging length, Nick Welch hurriedly gets his bat down to keep it out.
Short and on leg, Nick Welch hangs back to defend.
Starts with a full ball, on middle, Nick Welch turns it to mid-wicket.
Floated up, full and on off, Sean Williams smothers the spin.
Turning down leg on the shorter side, Sean Williams misses the tickle.
Tossed up, on off, Sean Williams defends it off the front foot.
Full and on the pads, clipped wide of mid-wicket for a single by Nick Welch.
Full again, on off, played back to Taijul.
Full and around off, Nick Welch pushes it to cover.
On off, on a nagging length, Sean Williams pats it back to the bowler.
Short and wide on off, cut straight to cover-point.
Pushed down leg, left alone by Sean Williams.
Full and on off, blocked out.
Leg bye! Nick Welch shows his cards early as he steps out and Mehidy Hasan Miraz spots it. Fires it down leg but Nick looks to help it away. Gets it off the pads past the keeper for a leg bye.
Floated up, full and on middle, Nick Welch turns it to mid-wicket.
Flatter and fuller, on off, Sean Williams keeps it out.
Short and on off, defended off the back foot.
Short and on middle, Sean Williams misses out on the flick and wears it on the pads.

FOUR! Aerial but safe! Tossed up, turning into the pads, Sean Williams looks to unleash the slog sweep with the turn. Gets more of a top edge and it goes towards deep backward square leg where Tanzim Hasan Sakib is in off the ropes and tries to backtrack and stretches his hands out but in vain.
Speared in short at the stumps, Nick Welch whips it wide of mid on for a single.
Short and on off, Nick Welch hangs back to defend.
From wide of the crease, outside off, left alone by Sean Williams.
Keeps it full and at the stumps, Sean Williams pats it back to Mehidy.
This kicks up a bit, on off, Sean Williams defends it with soft hands.
Pushed through, full and on middle, Sean Williams pushes it back to the bowler.
Full and on middle, Sean Williams leans forward to block.
Tosses it up, full and on off, Sean Williams lunges forward to defend.
Full and at the stumps, driven in front of mid on for a single.
Short and on middle, Sean Williams hangs back to defend.
Full and on off, kept out off the front foot.
Looped up, full and on off, Nick Welch steps out and knocks it to mid off.

A loud shout for LBW but turned down! This looks close and Najmul Hossain Shanto takes the review just before the timer runs out. Speared in at the front pad. Nick Welch presses forward and ekes out an inside edge onto the front pad. The front-on replay shows a deflection onto the pads from an inside edge and the UltraEdge does show a spike. The third umpire says that he has no conclusive evidence to suggest whether it was bat first or pad first. The on-field decision of NOT OUT stands.
Floated up, on off, Nick Welch pushes it to cover.
Flighted delivery on off, Sean Williams solidly blocks it to short cover.
Full on middle, Sean Williams drives it back to the bowler.
Short in length, on off, Sean Williams pushes it to short cover off the back foot.
A touch short on middle, Sean Williams gets right behind the line of the ball and defends it back to the bowler.
Fuller on off, Sean Williams prods forward and blocks it.
Tossed up, off break, outside off, Sean Williams takes a big stride forward and defends it.
Flighted delivery, turning away a bit, Nick Welch prods forward and defends it off the front foot.
Tossed up on off, Nick Welch skips down the track and drives it to mid off. No run.
Short and on the pads, Sean Williams glances it to deep backward square leg for one.
Floated up, full and on middle, Sean Williams flicks it a bit uppishly in front of mid-wicket.

OUT! DRAGGED ON! Instant impact from Taijul Islam! Taijul keeps it short but corrects his line, around off, Ben Curran rocks back for the cut but it is a risky shot against the turn. He pays the price as the ball spins back in to catch the inside edge and does not rise as much as Ben expected it to. The ball catches the inside edge and goes on to crash into the leg stump. Ben falls for 21 (50). Zimbabwe are now 72/2.
Ben Curran b T Islam 21 (50b 2x4 1x6)
Turning into the pads, on the shorter side, Ben Curran tucks it off the pads to square leg.
SIX! Belted! Tossed up, right in the slot, on middle, Nick Welch gets down on a knee quickly and slog sweeps it over mid-wicket for a six.
Full and attacking the front pad, Nick Welch blocks it out.
Looped up, full and on off, Nick Welch steps out and nudges it to mid-wicket.
Full and on the pads, Ben turns it in front of square leg for one.
On off, on a nagging length, Ben Curran defends it off the front foot.
Speared in at the stumps, Ben Curran blocks it out.
Nails the yorker, on off, Nick Welch jams it out beside the pitch on the leg side.
FOUR! Nicely done! On a shortish length, around off, Nick Welch swivels and rolls his wrists over the ball. Pulls it through mid-wicket for a boundary.
Wide! Banged in short but this goes over the batter's head.
On a hard length, on off, Nick Welch dabs it down the deck.
NO BALL! On a good length, on off, Nick Welch pats it back to Tanzim. Sakib has overstepped.
SIX! Hit with real authority! Tanzim bangs it in short, over middle. This sits up to be hit and Nick Welch stands tall to pull over square leg for a six.
In the channel on off, on a short of a length, punched to cover.
On a nagging length, on off, Nick Welch gets back to defend.
Short and on off, Ben Curran hangs back and defends it down.
Full and on off, blocked out off the front foot.
SIX! Clean strike! Mehidy Hasan Miraz gives the ball air and bowls it a bit too full, on off, Ben Curran gets under the ball and clobbers it over mid-wicket for a six.
Darted in on the pads, on a length, Ben Curran misses out on the flick.
Turning away and the length is pulled back, Ben Curran keeps it out on the off side.
Floated up, on off, Ben Curran smothers the spin.

Serves it nice and full, at the stumps, Nick Welch presents the full face of the bat and knocks it back past the bowler. Najmul Hossain Shanto from mid off gives it a chase and dives to prevent the boundary. Saves two runs for his side.
Length delivery, around off, Nick Welch pushes it to mid off.
On off, defended solidly by Nick.
Lands it on a good length, on middle, Nick Welch pats it back to Tanzim.
On a short of a good length, outside off, Nick Welch hops to get on top of the bounce to punch it away but mistimes it to cover.
Angling into the pads, Nick Welch whips this full ball wide of mid-wicket for a couple of runs.
Full and on middle, driven back to Mehidy.
Mehidy offers flight, full and on middle, Nick knocks it to long on for a single.
Turning down leg, on a length, Nick Welch misses the tickle.
Slower through the air, on middle, Nick Welch uses his feet and tucks it to mid-wicket.
Pushed through, full and on off, Nick Welch pushes it back to the bowler.

Taken at short leg and the umpire nods to give his decision! Nick Welch has reviewed it straight away. Floated up on Mehidy, on off, on a nagging length, Nick reaches it out in front as he goes for the reverse. The ball evades the bat and the glove as confirmed by UltraEdge. It lobs off the forearm towards short leg.
Full and sliding down leg, Ben Curran looks to flick it but can't connect, as the ball goes through to the wicket-keeper.
Length ball outside off, Nick Welch drives it to the left of short cover, he didn't middle it, as the ball hit the outer part of his bat. Single taken.

On a shortish length that bounces a bit extra and the batter is surprised by it! Nick Welch looks to defend it off the back foot but the ball brushes his shoulder and goes on the bounce to the wicket-keeper.
A touch full and just outside off, Nick Welch leans into the off drive but can't get it past mid off.
Back of a length and outside off, Nick Welch lets it go.
Good length, outside off, Nick Welch defends it towards short cover.
Tossed up, outside off, that doesn't turn, Curran covers the line of the ball and lets it go.
Overpitched on off, Ben Curran pushes it back to the bowler.

Sharp work! Tossed up on off, Ben Curran skips down the track and drives it to the right of Mehidy Hasan Miraz, who puts in a good dive and the ball sticks into his right hand. Curran is looking for a single and is surprised by the top effort from Mehidy Hasan Miraz as he stops midway to go back. Mehidy quickly gathers the ball and throws it back to the keeper, but the throw is a bit wide and hence Ben gets back in his crease.
Tossed up on middle, Ben Curran nicely leans foward and defends it.
Full and again just outside off, Ben Curran prods forward and defends it into the leg side.
Full and just outside off, Ben Curran defends it off the front foot.
Length ball on off, didn't move much, Nick Welch defends it with full face of the bat to mid off.

Full and swinging into the right hander, that has swung a lot. A banana swing if you want to call it. Nick Welch just about manages to bring his bat in time and gets a big inside edge as the ball hits his pads. A loud appeal but the Bangladesh team knew that there was an edge on it.
Length ball, seaming away, in the channel outside off, Nick Welch leaves it alone.

OUT! CAUGHT! Tanzim Hasan Sakib has his first Test wicket! Back of a length, in the channel of uncertainty, Brian Bennett throws his bat at it as he looks to play the cut. The ball takes the outside edge and the wicket-keeper, Jaker Ali, takes a good catch to his right.
Brian Bennett c J Ali b TH Sakib 21 (33b 5x4 0x6)
Length delivery on middle, Brian Bennett blocks it off the front foot as he gets right behind the line of that ball.
Good length on middle, Ben Curran works it to the left of short mid-wicket and takes a quick single.

Length delivery that actually comes into the left hander, on off, Ben Curran looks to play it into the leg side and hence he closes his bat face a bit and the ball takes the outside edge and falls just short of the first slip fielder. Nonetheless, it's a NO BALL as Tanzim has overstepped.

FOUR! Pulled away! Short again on middle, Brian Bennett rocks on the back foot and pulls this one over short mid-wicket for four. Poor over from Mehidy Hasan Miraz! He is got to get his length right here!
Fuller on middle, Brian Bennett defends it off the front foot as the ball goes on the bounce to forward short leg.
FOUR! This is poor from Mehidy! Short on middle, Brian Bennett punches it off the back foot through extra cover to pick up a boundary.
Again short in length just outside off, Ben Curran drives it to deep extra cover for a single.
Short length off break on off, Ben Curran stays back and punches it back to the bowler.
Slower through the air, turning away, just outside off, short in length, Ben Curran leans on the front foot and blocks it to short cover.
Short ball just outside off, Brian Bennett leaves it alone.
Length ball swinging into the left hander, on middle, Ben Curran looks to flick it and gets hit on the thigh pad of his front leg, as the ball goes towards deep fine leg. Batters run a leg bye.
Pitched up, on off, Ben Curran eases the drive to mid off.
On a good length, on off, Ben Curran pushes it to cover.
Pushed across the left-hander, on a length, Ben Curran makes the leave.
Angling across, on a good length, Ben Curran lets it go.
A touch short on off, Brian Bennett blocks it off the front foot, back to the bowler.
Short on middle, Ben Curran pushes it off the back foot to the left of short mid-wicket and takes a single.
Short and on off, Ben Curran stabs it out off the back foot.
Fuller on off, Ben Curran leans forward and blocks it with full face of the bat.

DROPPED! Shadman Islam puts it down! Lovely off break delivery that pitches on off stump and turns away ever so slightly as it takes the outside edge of Curran’s bat and goes straight to first slip, where Shadman spills a very easy chance.
Short length off break, that turns a bit, just outside off, Curran defends it off the back foot, back to the bowler.
Nice length delivery in the channel outside off, seaming into the right hander, Brian Bennett confidently lets it go as he judges the line of that ball to perfection.
Full on off, Brian Bennett looks to play the off drive and gets it off the bottom of the bat as the ball goes to mid on.

FOUR BYES! Short ball aimed at the body, Bennet ducks under it and lets it go. The ball evades the diving wicket-keeper to his left and goes for four byes. There was no real chance for the wicket-keeper to collect it.
Good length delivery on middle leg, Brian Bennett again presents full face of his bat as he blocks it back to the bowler.
Length ball swinging into the right hander, on off, Brian Bennett prods forward and defends it solidly off the front foot back to the bowler.
Length ball seaming into the right hander, Brian Bennett defends it off the back foot to the right of short cover.
Full and angled across, outside off, Ben Curran leaves it alone.

FOUR! Tanzim Hasan Sakib's got to get his line right here! A gift and put away! Full and sliding on the pads, Ben Curran flicks it fine as the ball goes past the wicket keeper towards fine leg region for four.
Good length delivery on middle, seaming away a touch, Ben Curran looks to work into the leg side and misses it again, as he gets hit near the thigh pad region of his back leg.
A touch fuller on leg stump, Ben Curran goes for the flick and misses it as he gets hit on the back leg. That ball was pitching outside leg. So no appeal for LBW.
On a length on middle, Ben Curran tucks it off his pads to short square leg. No run.
Length ball angled across the left hander, Ben Curran goes for the booming drive and gets beaten on the outside edge.
Length ball on off, Brian Bennett blocks it into the off side. That one seamed away a touch!

FOUR! Clipped away! Full on middle, this time Brian Bennett flicks it to the right of short mid-wicket as he finds the gap. The fielder from deep square leg runs to his left but can't cut it off. Four runs added to the total.
Back of a length, well outside off, Brian Bennett lets it go.
Full on leg stump, Brian Bennett flicks it straight to short mid-wicket.
Short ball on body, Ben Curran looks to play the pull but is in no control whatsoever, as the ball takes the top edge and falls just short of deep fine leg. Single taken.
Good length delivery on off, Ben Curran prods forward and pushes it to mid on.
Oh! Full length on middle leg, Brian Bennett looks to flick it but misses it as he can't get his bat down in time. Appeal follows but that one was probably sliding down leg.
On a good length, on off, Brian Bennett covers the line and blocks it out.
Full on middle, Ben Curran flicks to the right of square leg for a single.
Full again just outside off this time, Ben Curran pushes it off the front foot, back to the bowler.
FOUR! Width on offer and punished! Full and well outside off, Ben Curran plays the square drive as he gets it past the point fielder for four.
A touch fuller swinging into the left hander, on middle, Ben Curran flicks it straight to short square leg.
Back of a length just outside off, Brian Bennett looks to punch it off the back foot but gets it off the inner half of the bat as the ball goes to mid on.
On a good length, around off, Brian Bennett pats it to mid off.
Back of a length and outside off, Brian Bennett cuts it fiercely, but unlucky for him, as the ball goes on the bounce to point fielder.
Length ball seaming away, in the corridor of uncertainty, Brian Bennett leaves it alone at the last moment. He was caught in two minds there.
Again good length delivery, on off, Ben Curran defends it into the ground, and sets off for a quick run. That was more of a tip and run from Ben Curran!
On a length, just outside off, Ben Curran defends it as the ball goes to mid off.
Back of a length, moving away, well outside off, Brian Bennett lets it go. End of a good first over from debutant Tanzim Hasan Sakib!
Length ball on off stump, Bennett blocks it from the crease.

FOUR! Lovely from Brian Bennett! A touch full ball, on off, that ball didn't do much as it went straight, Brian Bennett presents the full face of the bat as he drives it gently past the bowler for four.

FOUR! Lucky for Brian Bennett! A touch fuller on off, swinging into the right hander, Brian Bennett looks to play the off drive without any feet movement, as the ball takes the inside edge and evades the wicket-keeper to go for four.
Good Length delivery that again seams away, in the channel outside off, this time Brian Bennett confidently lets it go as he watches it carefully.

Good start from the debutant. Length ball that seams away after pitching, in the channel outside off, Brian Bennett thinks of poking at it but withdraws his bat at the last moment as the ball goes past the outside edge.
Back of a length, again around off, Ben Curran pushes it into the leg side towards square leg.
A touch fuller moving away around off, Ben Curran defends it cautiously off the front foot, with a closed bat face.

Back of a length outside off, seaming away, Brian Bennett pokes at it and gets a thick outside edge that falls just short of the third slip who fails to collect it. The ball goes behind towards the third man region and the batters take a single.
Length ball, this time going away from the right hander, in the channel outside off, Brian Bennett goes for the drive without any feet movement and gets beaten on the outside edge.

Beauty! Length ball that jags back into the right hander, Brian Bennett is surprised by the movement as he fails to bring his bat in time as the ball goes past his inside edge and just over the stumps.
Length ball swinging into the right hander, on off, Brian Bennett solidly defends it off the front foot.
